Mna ndiwufundele umsebenzi endiwenzayo apha kwamasipala, kodwa uloyiko lwam kukuba ukufika kweenkokeli ezintsha zeDA kwakubangela ukuba zifune ukusebenza nabasebenzi bazo kuphela. Siza kuyakhela umkhanyo le nto,” utshilo lo msebenzi.

headline: Zindandela izantsi iflegi kwizakhiwo zikarhulumente
text:
Umongameli weli uJacob Zuma uqinisekise ukuba uzakungcwatywa ngokwaseburhulumente uMfundisi Makhenkesi Arnold Stofile.U Stofile ubhubhe ngo Mvulo waleveki emva kwengulo engephi esabambe isikhundla sokuzakuzela eli eJamani. Othethe egameni le ofisi kamongameli Bongani Ngqulunga uthi uZuma uyalele ukuba zindandele ezantsi iflegi kwizakhiwo zikarhulumente isithuba seveki. Ezi flegi zizakundandela ezantsi kude kungcwatywe uStofile ngo Lwesine weveki ezayo umhla wamashumi amabini anesihlanu kulenyanga. 
Ingxelo ithi kumiselwe ikomiti yabaphathiswa abaphuma kumasebe ahlukileyo ukuze baqalise ukwenza amalungiselelo omngcwabo ka Stofile.Urhulumente wephondo leMpuma Koloni kulindeleke ukuba adlale indima ephambili kwinkqubo yokulungiselela lomngcwabo. Lo ka Stofile ubhubhele eDikeni ngo Mvulo waleveki emva kwengulo engephi.Ubhubhe eminyaka ingamashumi asixhenxe anesibini.

headline: Oosopolitiki basithengisile isizwe
text:
Mhlawumbi uninzi lwabantu abahluthayo nabakwizikhundla eziphezulu kwezopolitiko bayakukhubeka sesi sihloko singentla.  
Kodwa ke bona abasalambayo kumashumi amabini anesine eminyaka emva kwenkululeko, baya kubaza iindlebe baphulaphule, kuba sebelahlekelwe yinkululeko kakade, ayikho enye into ke ngoko engaphezu kwenkululeko enokubalahlekela. 
 Abo bakhubekayo baya kwenza kakuhle ukuba banokuthi ekukhubekeni kwabo, baphendule imibuzo esoloko isezintliziyweni zabo bangakhange bayifumane inkululeko, sithetha ngemizi apho ikati seyide yazalela eziko kwiminyaka kwafika “inkululeko”, kuba le ntshayelelo yam ndiza kuyiqala ngemibuzo.  
1. Kwenzeke njani ukuba kuthi kwiminyaka engama-24 safumana inkululeko, kodwa yona indlala iye ikhula ide igqube kwisizwe sethu ngaphezu kwexesha leempimpi zooMatanzima namabhulu? Kule mihla yorhulumente wethu wenkululeko, abahluthayo bahlutha kakhulu, nabalambayo balamba kakhulu. Ngoba? Phakathi kwabahluthayo kukho abantu bamanye amazwe. Ngoba? 
2. Kwenzeke njani ukuba iinkonzo eziya ebantwini njengamanzi nelindle zisilele ngokokude abantu bangakwazi ukunyamezela, koko basuke baqhankqalaze? Bakhona abaza kuthi bambalwa abaqhankqalazela iinkonzo yaye ngexesha lamabhulu ayengekho amanzi acocekileyo, ii’toilet’ zamanzi nombane.  
Eyam impendulo ithi, akukho nto idlula isisu kuba besiwasela amanzi nokuba anonojubalala amdaka, besisomba imingxuma zelindle, besiwalayita amakhandlela sifunde ngawo, kodwa oorhulumente beempimpi bebesilwa bevuka bezama ukutyisa abantu, kuba kaloku bebehlaselwa kusithiwa bakhuthaza intlalo yobukhoboka. 
Kwizinto zonke onombulala ngazo umntu, isisu yinto yokugqibela. Kungeso sizathu kunemfumba yabantu kule mihla abathi, “Ukuba sasazile, kwakubhetele kwaseYiphutha”. Impimpi uSebe yada yaduma ngesaci esithi, “A meal a day”. Kurhulumente wenkululeko ngaphezu kwe 36% yabantu neentsapho zabo eMzantsi Afrika balala “without a meal a day.” Xa kuthelekiswa nendlala ye’democracy’, kwakuhluthwa ziimpimpi. 
3. Nangaphandle kwale 36% yabantu engaphangeliyo, kukho enye intlaninge yabantu abathi xa beqeshwa kuburhulumente kukhunyushwe kuthiwe “short term contract”.  
Ngumnta kabani onokuziphuhlisa aphumelele kwiminyaka emithathu nemihlanu? Apha ndibuza ngezinto ezazinqabe kakhulu ukuba zazikhona. Ngexesha leempimpi umntu oqeshwa ngakumbi eburhulumenteni ebesohlukana nomsebenzi ngokugeza, ukufa nokupenshina. Yona  “ishort term contract” ibine nto enokwenza nesivumelwano ikakhulu phakathi kwekontraka ezimeleyo norhulumente qha. 
Umzekelo, ngexesha urhulumente eqala ukusebenzisa iikompyuta kuburhulumente, bekusayinwa  “iishort term contracts” neenkampani ebeziza kufundisa amagosa oburhulumente. 
Kanti ke nalapho, bekusithi ukuba inkampani ethile iyacotha ilungiselela ukutya ixesha lekontraka, igxothwe kukhangelwe enye.Wona amadelakufa la zizinto ebebezifunda phi ezi basiphathela zona, ingaba bebezifunda elubhacweni? 
4. EMzantsi Afrika siphantse sibenazo zonke iintlobo zezimbiwa, wena golide, wena platinum njl. Siphinde kwathina sifuye sibenawo namahlathi, ngaphandle kwendlala le egqubayo, besifanele ukuba silelona lizwe lihluthayo eAfrika. Kutheni ke ngoko eMzantsi Afrika singakwazi ukuzenzela izinto zoshishino (industrialization) esizisebenzisayo.Yintoni le ayesenzele yona amaTshayina nezinye iintlanga le nto yonke into soloko ithengwa kuwo inombhalo othi “Made in China”?. Ndinixelela ukunganixokisi, ngexesha likaMatanzima noSebe zazikhona iifektri ezazikhiqiza iimpahla ezisemgangathweni phantsi kweliso lamaTaiwan awagxothwa yiANC. 
Namhlanje ezo fektri ngamabhodlo eTranskei naseCiskei nakwamanye amaphandle eempimpi. OoHlohlesakhe soloko begaya iivoti ngokuthi baza kuvuselela iifektri nee “Irrigation Scheme”, iyaphela iminyaka engama24 ngoApreli, into enwenwayo ngamashishini, ziivenkile nezirhoxo zabantu bangaphandle (foreigners). 
5. Okokugqibela nokona kubalulekileyo, leliphi ilizwe apha emhlabeni, elithi emva kokuphalala kwegazi lamadelakufa kusilwelwa inkululeko, lithi kanye ngexesha lenkululeko linikezele uqoqosho (economy) lwelizwe kwiimbacu zamanye amazwe (foreigners), logama zona iinkokheli zihleli ebhotolweni nabacinezeli belixa langaphambili (colonialists) kusityiwa ubutyebi besizwe?  
Ingaba iyanothusa na imeko yokubona amadoda nabafana begcwalise izitalato befolele imisebenzi engasoze ibekho kuba imali isezipokotweni zeengqondi? Nina bavoti niza kubizwa ngexesha levoti ninikwe “iifood parcels” ezingumxhesho.  
Ndiza kubanaso isiqendu ngomxhesho ndicacisele isizwe ukuthi lo mxhesho nenkamnkam (pensions and grants) aqhayisa ngazo uRamaphosa ngumvungulo wokusigcina siphefumla khona ukuze siphinde sivote kwelandelayo ivoti. 
Injalo nje musani ukuqhatheka, asingobantu abazizigidi ezingama17 abatya umxhesho kweli lizwe.Wena ungaphindaphinda elo nani kathathu kuba kukho amakhaya axhomekeka kulo mxhesho kuba, nangaphandle kwemisebenzi, imali yabantu nemisebenzi ayikho eMzantsi Afrika.  
Konke oku ndiza kukucacisa xa ndibhala isiqendu somxhesho. Uyabona ke mfundi, ukuba ufuna ukusazi esona sizathu esibangele ukuthi ndibhale le ncwadi, kukufumanisa ukuthi kanti thina sizwe saseMzantsi Afrika s-a-athengiswa kudala ngabezopolitiko logama zona iinkokheli zihleli ebhotolweni nabo babesicinezela.  
Ewe ibuhlungu yaye siyothusa eso sityhilelo, kodwa ndinganiqinisekisa ukuba eli nqaku ndiza kulibhala ngesiXhosa ukwenzela ukuthi nina bantwana nicacisele abazali benu ngokuqhubekayo, kuba lifikile ixesha lokuba kuthethwe iinyaniso zodwa ngemeko yelizwe lethu. Sasiphethwe ziimpimpi namabhulu kodwa azange kubenesimbonono nentlupheko efana nale kwisizwe siphela, intlungu yethu yayiyingcinezelo yezopolitiko, namhlanje sicinezelwa eziswini ngoqoqosho (economically). Impimpi uSebe yabagcina abantu nge “meal a day”, yena uMatanzima esithi, “Thabatha okunikwayo ukusebenzisele ukuzuza okufunayo”. Ngoku asinikwa kwanto kuba imali isezipokotweni zooHlohlesakhe abahlaba umkhosi bathi “VIVA!!” xa kusondele ixesha levoti. 
Nangoku ke ,uMadiba wathabatha akunikwayo batsho bafunda abantwana baseTranskei. Unangoku ke, abantwana baseTranskei basayibambile imfundo abashiywa nayo ngabazali. 
Benisazi na phofu ukuba abona gqirha bahlonitshwayo apha eMzantsi Afrika ngabo bafunde eUnitra eguqulwe yabizwa WSU?  
Xa nicinga ke nina bantu bakuthi, ingaba niyakhumbula na ukuba ngexesha lengcinezelo amabhulu ayephethe amashishini asezidolophini, bona abantu abamnyama benyanzelwa ukuba bashishine ezilokishini kuphela?  
Ke ngoku kwenzeke njani ukuba kuthi xa sikhululwa, urhulumente ophetheyo avulele amaTshayina, amaPakistan nama-Indiya kurhwebo ezazulwini zezixeko zethu (CBDs)?  
Aphinde asicinezele ngaphezulu kwiilokishi neelali zethu ngokulungiselela amaSomali, amaBangladesh nezinye iintlanga ezilalini nasezilokishini. Kwakutheni ze bangasicingeli thina bavoti ngexesha leengxoxo ezaziqhubeka phambi kwenkululeko ngakumbi kuCODESA I no II? Ngubani owayefanele ukunika abantu imali yokushishina ngezirhoxo neevenkile ezilalini nasezidolophini elizweni labo? 
Andithethi ngobubhanxa obulibazisayo beeSEDA (Small Enterprise Development Agency) eyinkqatho yokuqaba ibhotolo emehlweni ngokunga kukho into eyenziwayo. KulooSEDA yabo kwawena kuthiwa jikeleza ufuna “ibusiness plan” lo gama abahlobo babo bama’grigamba’ (foreigners) bevela bafike bavule isirhoxo elalini naselokishini.  
Iseyintshayelelo le, ndiza kuthetha ndophele ngale ntlungu ndakufika kwisiqendu sabahlobo bakarhulumente, ama’grigamba’(foreigners). Ungafunga uthi abona bantu bavotela ezi nkokheli zethu ngaba bantu bavela kwamanye amazwe.  
Zikhona ke iingcaphephe neeprofesa eziye zachaza mayela nokuye kwaqhubeka ikakhulu ngamaxesha andulela inkululeko nangeengxoxo zalo maxesha. 
Ndingamqinisekisa nabani na ofunda le ncwadi ukuba ndilwenzile ngokwaneleyo uphando, andizukuthetha izinto eziphuma emqaleni wam, kodwa sona isizwe sithengisiwe ngoosopolitiki.  
Le ncwadi andiyibhaleli ukufumana imali ndityebe, ukuba ibikhona indlela yokuba ndihlawulwe iindleko zokuyibhala nokuyisasaza, bendiya kwanela nokuba mna andifumani nesenti. 
Abantu abaninzi, ngakumbi abantu abamnyama, abafikeleli kulwazi oluninzi ngelizwe labo kuba abakuthandi ukufunda iincwadi, izifundiswa ziyakwazi ukugqiba ngekamva lesizwe abantu bengaqondi.  
Kodwa ke xa ndithetha inyani, umntu olambileyo akanalo ixesha lokuhamba ekhangela okuqulathwe ziincwadi ngobomi bakhe, ngakumbi xa eyithembile inkokheli yakhe nezithembiso zayo.  
Kodwa ke ubaw’uPakade ophicotha afunde iincwadi kwiLukhanji Radio akavumelani nalo ngcinga yam, uthi baninzi abantu abamnyama abazifundayo iincwadi. Ndingavuya kakhulu ukuba kunokwenzeka ukuthi ndibe ndiyaphazama. 
*Le yintshayelelo yencwadi entsha ezayo enguBahlutha ke Bona

headline: Ikhabhinethi yaseNtshona Koloni
text:
INkulumbuso yaseNtshona Koloni, uAlan Winde, uchonge abaphathiswa bamasebe ngolu hlobo.  
ElokuHlaliswa koLuntu: Tertius Simmers; ElezeMali noQoqosho: David Maynier; EloPhuhliso loLuntu: Sharna Fernandez; Isebe loRhumento lwaseMakhaya nezeNdalo: Anton Bredell; Isebe lezoThutho neeNkonzo zoLuntu: Bonginkosi Madikizela; Isebe lezoKhuseleko: Albert Fritz; ElezoLimo: Ivan Meyer; ElezeMfundo: Debbie Schafer; ElezeMpilo: Nomafrench Mbombo. EleNkcubeko neMidlalo: Anrouz Marais.

headline: Kuza kushiyana oomama ukondla
text:
Ibiyinkungu nelanga ngoMgqibelo odlulileyo kwisixeko saseBhayi ngelixa abalandeli be-ANC bebesemcimbini wokuphehlelela umqulu wezithembiso zolonyulo loomasipala basekhaya nolubekelwe umhla wesithathu kweyeThupha.  
Nangona kuqapheleke okokuba uninzi lwabantu alukunanzanga ukuyokumamela intetho kaMongameli Jacob Zuma kwibala lezemidlalo, endaweni yoko lakhetha ukuyokuba ngabakhenkethi echwebeni nakwiziphaluka zesixeko, akuthandabuzeki okokuba umbutho we-ANC uqule waligangatha. 
Kukhangeleka ngathi kuza kushiyana oomama ukondla njengoko kulindeleke namanye amaqela ezopolitiko alandele ekhondweni ngokuphehlelela eyawo imiqulu yezithembiso zolwenyulo, aphinde azise eluntwini abagqatswa abagaqele izikhundla zokuba ngooceba. 
Kaloku urhulumente wasekhaya usisipili esibonisa amandla aphembelela okwenzeka elizweni jikelele ngokwezopolitiko nezoqoqosho, amaqhina nemiqengqelezi ejikeleze intlalo yethu sonke nesithi sithathele phezu kwayo izigqibo malunga nokokuba ngubani omakalawule emva kolonyulo. 
Ngala mahla-ndinyuka aza- kugweba okokuba izithembiso zolonyulo ezenziwa ngamaqela ezopilitiko ziyamkeleka na okanye azamkeleki eluntwini. Kuza- kubonakala ngeziphumo zohlobo abantu abazakuvota ngalo nenani labazixhamleyo bayokuvota. 
Okokuqala, kulwenyulo lorhulumente wasekhaya kukho amaqela ezopilitiko anabalandeli kuphela kwiindawo ezithile zasekuhlaleni hayi kuzwelonke okanye ephondweni jikelele ngaloo ndlela anikeze abavoti uluhlu lweenkokheli abangaketha kulo olungqamene ncakasana neendawo abahlala kuzo. Okwesibini, uhlobo lokhuphiswano olujiyileyo lunikeza ithuba lokumelwa kwabavoti okuphangaleleyo okuquka amaqela ezopolitiko amancinci asekuhlaleni kunye namakhulu akuzwelonke. 
Nangona lufanele ukuzisa ithuba elibalulekileyo lokokuba abavoti baxhamle kulawulo lwesininzi kwiindawo abahlala kuzo ngohlobo olubanxibelelanisa neenkokheli kunye namaqela ezopolitiko asekuhlaleni olwenza urhulumente aphendule malunga nezigqibo zolalwulo nophuhliso lwempilo yasekuhlaleli; akusoloko kunjalo. 
Oku kukwadizwe kule veki iphelileyo yimeko yokuphuma ingqina kweenkokheli zikazwelonke ze-ANC, ziquka uMongameli Zuma, iSekela Mongameli uCyril Ramaphosa kunye nabaphathiswa bakazwelonke nabamaphondo, zithe bhazalala kwiilokishi zesixeko saseBhayi zingena umnyango nomnyango zigaya inkxaso yabavoti. 
 Ukuthontelana kwezinxibamxhaka emizini yabavoti ngolu hlobo zigaya inkxaso kuyenza ingaqapheleki into yokokuba eneneni isiqingatha sooceba abazakonyulwa ngabagqatswa basekuhlaleni (ward councilors). 
Kungoko eminye imibutho yezopolitiko ikhuthaza abavoti okokuba bathathe inxaxheba ekwenyuleni abantu basekuhlaleni ababathembileyo njengeenkokheli namagama abo azakugqibela ekuluhlu lwabagqatswa abazakuvela ephepheni lokuvota ngomhla wolonyulo.  
Zithi zakuthontelana njengoko kubonakele kwiveki ephelileyo iinkokheli zikazwelonke zizokugaya inkxaso yabavoti ngaphambi kolonyulo lorhulumente wasekhaya kubekho ukubethabethana kwengqondo malunga nokokuba ingaba ibalulekile na into yokuba ozigqatsela kwisikhundla sokuba nguceba uyaziwa ekuhlaleni okanye okubalulekileyo kukuba ulilungu lowuphi umbutho kusina na? 
Oku kubethabethana kweembono kubonakale ngohlobo olulodwa ngelixa bekuxanjuliswana emaphephandabeni nakoonomathotholo ngephekepheke lebhodi yentengiso enemibala ye-ANC nebixhonywe kwisakhiwo esikwi Hill Road eKorsten enombhalo oqaqambileyo othi “Danny Jordaan, awuphathelwe ngokuzingca nguJacob Zuma”. 
Nangona ekuqaleni bekungaqondakali umnini wesi senzo, kodwa ekuhambeni kwethuba ilungu le-DA * -Andrew Whitfield uye wakuvuma okokuba nguye oyalele ukuxhonywa kwale bhodi ngoLwesithathu weveki ephelileyo, “ngenjongo yokubonakalisa unxibelelwano phakathi kukaJacob Zuma kunye noDanny Jordaan” we-ANC ozigqatsela ukuba nguSodolophu weNelson Mandela Bay Metropolitan Municipality. 
Okwangoku kubonakala ngathi lusengakekelela ekubeni yinkundla yokhuphiswano kwamaqela ezopolitiko kazwelonke yaye lusengaphazamisana nethuba elibalulekileyo lokuthabatha izigqibo ngamabavotelwe ngohlobo oluqinisa iintsika zolawulo lwesininzi kwiindawo esihlala kuzo nelimelwe kukusondeza urhulumente ebantwini. Kubonakala ngathi ngolo hlobo, lusengabhekelisela kude ebantwini upolitiko lwasekuhlaleni nekufanele okokuba lulo oluphembelela izigqibo zabavoti malunga nabona bagqatswa amababavotele ukuze balawule ngohlobo oluphucula impilo yethu sonke. 
 Ucingo luwile, kutsiba nezimithiyo!

headline: Umbulali kaHani ubhubhe nenyani
text:
UClive Derby-Lewis, ungqondongqondo ekubulaweni kwetshantliziyo lezopolitiko uChris Hani, ubhubhele kwisibhedlele sasePitoli ngoLwesine. 
UDerby-Lewis nguye owanikezela umpu kuJanusz Walus owadubula uHani ngo1993. Ngenxa yesi senzo, uDerby-Lewis wagwetywa ubomi ejele. 
Lo kaDerby-Lewis wanikwa ingqawule yabagulayo yinkundla yezomthetho kunyaka ophelileyo emva kokuphanza kwamalinge akhe esicelo sokukhululwa. 
Ukukhululwa kwakhe nyakenye kwabangela ingxokolo yabantu ababekhalaza besithi akazange ayichaze ncakasana into eyabangela ukuba athabathe inxaxheba ekubulaweni kukaHani. 
Phakathi kwabantu abebekhala yinkosikazi kaHani uLimpho kwanamaKomanisi (SACP), umbutho apho lo kaHani wayengunobhala kuwo. 
UDerby-Lewis ebesoloko ekhala ngokugula ngumhlaza.

headline: Ufunwa ngapha nangapha ochithwe yiPirates!
text:
Obefudula edlala kwi-Orlando Pirates ufunwa ngamaqela aliqela emva kokuqhawulwa kwesivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. Ekuqaleni kwale veki iPirates ibhengeze ukuba yohlukene noPatrick Phungwayo emva kokuqhawulwa kwesivumelwano sakhe sengqesho. UPhungwayo, 29, ukhululekile ukuba azibandakanye nokuba leliphina iqela phambi kokuvalwa kwenyoba yokutyikitywa kwabadlali (kwiPSL) namhlanje. Lo mdlali waya kwiBucs esuka kwiBidvest Wits kwisithuba seminyaka emihlanu edlulileyo. 
“Isivumelwano sokohlukana phakathi kweqela noPatrick Phungwa kufikelelwe kuso ngesihle kwintlanganiso ebikhona. Sinqwenelela lo mdlali okuhle kodwa emva kokusebenzela thina ukusukela ngo’2012,” itshilo ingxelo ekhutshwe yiPirates aph’evekini. 
Nangona kwakulindeleke okokuba uPhungwayo agqame ekufikeni kwakhe kwiPirates – kodwa inkqubela yakhe yakhonkxwa kukumane esonzakala nokhuphiswano olukhoyo kwiPirates. Ngamashumi amahlanu anesithandathu (56) iyonke imidlalo ayidlalileyo kwiPirates ukusukela ngo’2012 – kodwa kwisizini ephelileyo ukwazile ukudlala imidlalo esondeleyo kumashumi amabini nangona ebekhuphisana namaxhwangusha afana noThabo Matlaba noMarc van Heerden. 
Uhlengahlengiso olwenziwa kwiPirates luza emva kokuba ivale isizini ka’2016/17 ikwindawo yeshumi elinanye futhi ingacholanga naphantsi kwiindebe ezidlalelweyo. Ukuhamba kukaPhungwayo kuze emva kokuhamba kuka-Oupa Manyisa othathwe yiMamelodi Sundowns phambi kokuqala kwale sizini iqhubayo. Iingxelo zithi uPhungwayo ufunwa yiSuperSport United neFree State Stars eqeqeshwa nguLuc Eymael. Ikamva lalo mdlali kulindeleke licace phambi kokuphela kosuku lwanamhlanje.

headline: USipho Mbule uthengiselwe iMamelodi Sundowns, utsho uMatthews
text:
Emva kokwenziwa amaqashiso ngekamva likaSipho Mbule ixesha elide, namhlanje ufumene ikhaya elitsha. Ngoku ungumdlali opheleleyo weMamelodi Sundowns. Oku kubhengezwe yiSuperSport United abeyidlalela ngentsasa yanamhlanje. Ukusukela ekuqaleni konyaka ka-2022, uMbule khange akwazi ukuyidlalela iSuperSport United emva kokusikwa ngabaphathi. Lo nto yenzeka emva kokuqhankqalaza kwakhe kuba wayefuna ukuhamba njengabadlali abafana noTeboho Mokoena odlalela iSundowns naye ngoku. Ngelo xesha umqeqeshi wakhe yayinguKaitano Tembo owagxothwayo naye ngenxa yeziphumo ezingancumisiyo. 
UMbule, 24, waqala ukudlalela iqela elikhulu ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika kwisizini ka-2015/16 kwiSuperSport United (Academy) esuka kwiVirginia Sports Academy. Ukusukela ngoko, uMbule udlalele Amatsatsantsa imidlalo emininzi kwaye ukwazile ukuwanceda aphumelela indebe yeMTN8 kabini. Wayekhona nangethuba iSuperSport ibethwa emdlalweni wokugqibela weCAF Confederation Cup phantsi kuka-Eric Tinkler ngonyaka ka-2017. “Oku kukwazisa ukuba iSuperSport United neMamelodi Sundowns zivumelelene ngokuthengiselana uSipho Mbule ongumdlali wasesiswini,” utshilo uStan Matthews. 
“Kusivisa kabuhlungu ukulahlekelwa ngumdlali onesiphiwo njengoSipho, ngakumbi kwikhabathiso akulo. Akukho nto esingayizamanga esemandleni wethu ebinokuguqula izinto – kodwa kwiinyanga ezigqithileyo kuye kwacaca ukuba ingqondo yakhe ayisekho kwiSuperSport United. Sibone kulungile ke ukohlukana naye ngesihle. Simnqwenelela okuhle kodwa kwaye sinethemba lokumbona eqhuba kakuhle kwiqela lakhe elitsha nakwiqela lesizwe,” utshilo uStan Matthews oyingqonyela yeSuperSport United. UMbule uwadlalele onke amaqela esizwe elizwe loMzantsi Afrika, ukusukela kwi-Under 17 ukuya kuBafana Bafana. Ngoku ulandela amadoda afana noMokoena noModiba.

headline: Yintlungu into yokuvalwa kweFitness Joint
text:
Umbutho wabaququzeleli bamanqindi eMpuma Koloni, i-Eastern Cape Promoters Boxing Association, ubambe inkomfa noonondabe kwihotele iMdantsane Sun izolo. 
Phakathi kwezinto ebeziphambili kumgomo wale nkomfa ngumba wotshintsho kumalungu alawula lo mbutho. 
Le nkomfa ibilandelela kwintlanganiso kawonke wonke ibibanjwe ngulo mbutho ebutsheni bale nyanga.  
Usihlalo walo mbutho * -Ayanda Matiti uyicacise nje ngentlungu into yokuvalwa komzi wokuziqeqesha iMdantsane Fitness Joint kutsha nje 
. “Ukuvalwa kwela ziko yinto ebuhlungu kuthi nje ngabaququzeleli bamanqindi. Sele kukho inqwaba yeentshatsheli eziphuma kula ndawo, kwaye nabantu abaninzi baseMdantsane izakubabuyisela emva lento kuba ibilikhaya labo eliya,” utshilo uMatiti. 
“Abantu bazakusokola kuba kufuneka babuyele eVirgin Active, eMonti, loonto izakuzisa iindleko nangakumbi kubo. Lento siyafuna ukuba urhulumente ayiqwalasele naye asincedise.” 
Kwintlanganiso ibibanjwe kutsha nje eCintsa, kwangezwe amalungu amatsha kulo mbutho ngokubanzi. UPhindile Mbhele, Sibongile Matiti, Ntsikayezwe Sigcawu, Xolani Jamani noMbulelo Mfama ngamalungu amatsha kulo mbutho. 
UMatiti ugxininisile ukuba ukukhula kwamanqindi yinto yomntu wonke kuba lo mdlalo uchaphazela iimpilo zabantu abaninzi. “Amashishini abucala, oonondaba kunye neminye imibutho banoxanduva loku 
Umntu ongengomququzeleli wamanqindi uza kusokola ukwenza imilo ngoku, kuba aba bantu batsha batyunjiweyo baza kuqinisekisa ukuba akusebenzi nabani na, ubethelele lo mcimbi lo mbutho.

headline: IDowns ihleli phezulu emva kokucambalalisa iBaroka
text:
IBaroka FC ibokoboko macala emva kokuba ivuthululwe yiMamelodi Sundowns ngo’4-0 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obuvutha bhe eLucas Moripe Stadium namhlanje ebusuku. Umqeqeshi weDowns, uPitso Mosimane, uthe ufuna iqela lakhe ufuna liphumelele ngamagowuli amaninzi namhlanje – abadlali bakhe benze kanye le nto ebeyifuna. Le mpumelelo yaMasandawana iwathathe yawabeka phezulu kwiPSL. Emva kwemidlalo elishumi ngoku iDowns inamanqaku alishumi elinethoba phantsi kwegama layo, ishiya iBaroka ehleli ixesha elide phezulu ngegowuli. Umdlalo okwinqanaba eliphezulu oveliswe liqela likaPitso kuthetha ukuthi ubunganga balo bubuyele kulo. Kulindekele le mpumelelo ibuyise ukuzithemba kubadlali beSundowns egqwidizileyo ekuqaleni kwale sizini ngenxa yokudinwa kwabadlali yimidlalo yeChampions League. 
Motjeka Madisha ungcangcazelise umnatha ngepenela emva kokuwiswa kukaSibusiso Vilakazi kumzuzu wesithathu kwisiqingatha sokuqala. Emva koko uThemba Zwane ufake igowuli lesibini emva kokufumana ibhola entle egotywe kwicala lasekhohlo. Abadlali beBaroka FC khange banikezele ngoba baqhubele phambili nokudlala umdlalo wabo wesiqhelo – kodwa ingxaki abathe bayifumana namhlanje kukuba iSundowns ayibanikanga ithuba lokuhlanganisa iibhola. Lo nto ibangele bangakwazi ukungena kumhlaba weDowns. UPercy Tau uvalelise ngamagowuli amabini – wavalwa umkhusane. Ngoku iSundowns ihleli phezulu kwiPSL emva kokucambalalisa iBaroka engadlala kakuhle namhlanje. Iya kumdlalo wayo olandelayo inamandla emva kokufumana inkuthazo kumdlalo wanamhlanje. 
Mamelodi Sundowns: Onyango, Langerman, Soumahoro (Arendse 35′), Morena, Madisha, Billiat, Kekana, Mabunda, Vilakazi, Zwane, Tau. 
Amalalela: Brimah, Zwane, Arendse, Ngcongca, Manyisa, Lebese, Zakri. 
Baroka FC: Vries, Shaku, Masenamela, Chawapihwa, Banda, Mosele, Kgoetyane, Macha, Madubanya, Mdantsane, Ngalande. 
Amalalela: Masuluke, Motupa, Matloga, Kgaswane, Rethabile, Ntshangase, Mahashe.

headline: Zishiyene kwanzima iimbaleki eQonce!
text:
Iimbaleki ezingaphaya kwamakhulu amathathu eziphuma kulo lonke iphondo leMpuma Koloni ziphume ngobunzi bazo ukuya kugqatso [umdyarho weembaleki] ezikhuphisene kulo ngokuyimpumelelo. Olu gqatso bekukhumbulwa ngalo umhla wamalungelo oluntu kwilizwe loMzantsi Afrika kweli phondo. Lo mnyhadala obuququzelelwe lisebe leZemidlalo, uLonwabo noBugcisa ububanjelwe eVictoria Grounds cebu kuhle kwidolophu yaseQonce ekuseni namhlanje. Kolu suku lubaluleke kangaka eli sebe likhokelwa nguMphathiswa uPemmy Majodina likhumbule iziganeko ezibini futhi ezibaluleke kakhulu kwimbali yomntu omnyama eMzantsi Afrika ukusukela ngeentsuku zomzabalazo ukuza lokuzuzwa kwenkululeko ngo’1994. 
                                 
Njengokuba kubhiyozelwe usuku lwamalungelo olungomhla wamashumi amabini ananye kweYokwindla [21, March], kwelinye icala kukwakhunjulwe notshotshentla kwezomzabalazo uSteve Bantu Biko – owasweka kwiminyaka engamashumi amane eyadlulayo emva kokubulawa nguRhulumente wobandlululo owawukhokelwa ngabantu abamhlophe. Umhla wamalungelo oluntu wabekelwa bucala emva ko’94 ukuze kukhunjulwe isiganeko ekwabhubha kuso abantu abamnyama abakumashumi amathandathu anethoba (69) bebulawa ngolunya ngamagosa omthetho kaRhulumente wobandlululo. 
Iimbaleki zeMpuma Koloni zidele loo mozulu ebingashushwanga ncam zaya kukhuphiswano obelunomtsalane kakhulu kwiimbaleki ezisafufuzayo nezo zindala. Phambi kokusuka kwazo ezi iimbaleki eVictoria Grounds, umphathiswa uMajodina, uzikhaphe ngamazwi wenkuthazo athi: “Xa ubaleka olu gqatso, uze ukhumbule uSteve Bantu Biko owalwela thina sonke ukuze sibe namalungelo.” 
                              
Iintombi nabafana ababaleke olu gqatso batyhutyha-tyhutyhe ezo zitalato zedolophi yaseQonce zade zayakufika entanjeni. Iziphulo zime ngolu hlobo: 
  
Amanenekazi 
       
  
Amanenekazi amancinane 
  
  
Amanenekazi aneminyaka eyi-35 nangaphezulu 
  
  
Amanene  
  
  
Amanene asedyongo 
  
  
Amanene angaphezulu kwe-35

headline: UGiovanni Solinas ubalula afuna kwenziwe liqela lakhe kule sizini
text:
Amakhosi aphose ithuba elihle lokuxolisa iintliziyo zabalandeli abanengcwangu emva kokuba ekhutshwe kwiMTN 8 izolo ebusuku. Igowuli elinye elifakwe kuBradley Grobler liyithathe iSuperSport United layibeka kumdlalo wokugqibela weMTN 8. Amatsatsantsa a Pitori abethe iKaizer Chiefs ngo’1-0 kumdlalo olawulwe ngawo ubukhuli becala eFNB Stadium kubusuku bayizolo. Ngokubethwa kwayo iChiefs, kuyiphosanise nethuba elihle lokuphumelela indebe yokuqala kwisizini entsha yePSL. Umqeqeshi weChiefs, uGiovanni Solinas, uphoxiwe kukubethwa kweqela lakhe – kodwa uthi kufuneka iqela lakhe lisebenze ngokuzimisela ukuze liphumelele iindebe. 
Kwizigaba zozibini zomdlalo, iChiefs ibingenalo ulwamvila kwaye nokubethwa kwayo akothusanga ngoba abadlali bayo ababonisanga kuyilangazelela impumelelo. “Isiqendu sokuqala besinzima kuthi ngoba indlela abadlali bethu abebenikelana ngayo ayisisebenzelanga. Ndingatsho ukuba umdlalo wethu ubungemhlanga kwisigaba sokuqala. Kubekho utshintsho kwisigaba sesibini ngoba sikwazile ukudala amathuba. Ngelishwa kuye kwafakwa igowuli kuthi – kodwa umdlalo wethu ubungcono,” utshilo uSolinas emva komdlalo. 
Nakubeni uSolinas engalifumananga ithuba lokulungiselela isizini entsha – kodwa uyazazi okokuba umsebenzi wakhe usemngciphekweni ukuba akakwazi ukuza nendebe. USolinas, ongene endaweni kaSteve Komphela, ufike iChiefs inethuba elingaphaya kweminyaka emithathu ingafumani zindebe. Kuba umdlalo wokuqala obuphakathi kweChiefs neSuperSport waphela ngo’2-2 eLucas Moripe Stadium, iChiefs bekufuneka ingabethwa qha emdlalweni – kodwa ngelishwa, yoyiswe kukukhusela amagowuli wayo nakukuphumelela. “Besinethuba elihle lokuya phambili kwindebe yeMTN 8. Ibibalulekile le ndebe kuthi. Kuyadakumbisa ukungayi kumdlalo wokugqibela. Kufuneka sisebenzi ngokuzimisela ngoba kule isizini kufuneka siphumelele iindebe. Kufuneka siphucule indlela esidlala ngayo,” utsho uSolinas.

headline: Uqhwatyelwe izandla uStephen Mokoka owenze imbali eGqeberha!
text:
Isidima selizwe loMzantsi Afrika sifunqukile kwicandelo lezeembaleki emva kokuva uStephen Mokoka enze iziqwenga emdyarhweni weembaleki obubanjelwe eGqeberha. UMokoka, 37, wenze imbali kwimpelaveki egqithileyo ngethuba ephumelela iNedbank Ultra Marathon engumgama ongamashumi amahlanu eekhilomitha (50km) ngexesha eliziiyure ezimbini, amashumi amane emizuzu nemizuzwana elishumi elinesithathu (2:40:13). Ngokwenza njalo, uMokoka wophule irekhodi lehlabathi elenziwa yimbaleki yaseTopiya (Ethiopia) egama linguKketema Negasa eyabaleka umgama ongamashumi amahlanu ngeeyure ezimbini ezinamashumi amane anesibini emizuzu nemizuzwana esixhenxe (2:42:07). 
Umsebenzi omkhulu owenziwe yile mbaleki yemigama emide yaseMahikeng, kwiphondo laseMntla Ntshona, uvunyuwe ngumbutho olawula ezembaleki, iWorld Athletics, wagqwatyelwa ngabantu abaninzi. Kusoloko kutshila iimbaleki zamanye amazwe kwimidyarho yeembaleki ebanjelwa eMzantsi Afrika. Yiyo le nto ukuphumelela kukaMokoka kwenze kwancasa kakhulu ebantwini belizwe lakhe. “Ndidinwe,” utshilo uMokoka emva kokuphuma entanjeni. Ngokokutsho kwakhe uMokoka, yena ebengacinganga ukuba angayiphumelela iNedbank Marathon. Uye eGqeberha ezilungiselele njengakweminye imidyarho yeembaleki aqhele ukuya kuyo. 
Ukwamkele kodwa ukuphumelela kwakhe nangona ethe iya kuthatha ixesha ukuze ingene engqondweni yakhe into yokuba nguye intshatsheli eyenze imbali. “Indlela ibinde kakhulu. Andazi nokuba ndiza kuziva njani emva kwalo mdyarho – kodwa bendiwonwabele. Phambi komdyarho, kukho iindlela entsha esiyizamileyo nomqeqeshi wam. Besifuna ukuvavanya yona kuba sifuna ukubona ukuba iza kusebenza na. Ndiyathemba ukuba indlela endibaleke ngayo ayindigqibanga amandla ngoba ndifuna ukuya kwiWorld Championship,” utshilo okaMokoka. Umongameli we-Athletics South Africa, uMnu. uJames Moloi, uvuyisene noMokoka emva kokwenza umsebenzi omhle. “Kusivuyise kakhulu ukubona iimbaleki zethu ziqhuba kakuhle ekhaya. Emva kokuphazanyiswa yiKhorona, ngoku sizama ukuza nemidyarho emininzi,” utshilo uMoloi.

headline: UMpengesi uyifuna kwiTop 8 iChippa
text:
Emva kokuthi khebevu emakhaya ngenxa yeeholide zokuphela konyaka, abadlali bamaqela adlala kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League babuyela emsebenzini kule veki.  
Iqela laseMpuma Koloni, iChippa United, lelinye lamaqela azakwakhelwa umkhanyo kakhulu ngabantu emva kokugqwidiza kwisizini ka-2016/17. Kodwa kule sizini izinto zibonakala zingcono nangoba zisekhona iindawana ezifuna ukuqhoshwa. 
 Usihlalo weChippa United, uSiviwe Mpengesi, ufuna iqela lakhe libe phakathi kwamaqela akwiTop 8 ekupheleni kwesizini futhi lizibekele indawo nakwiCaf. 
Oku kuphume kuMpengesi ngethuba esamkela izitshovu-tshovu zabadlali abane anethemba lokuba bakuthi bancedise ekuqinisekiseni ukuba injongo zalo ziyaphumelela.  
IiChilli Boys zamkele uNkosinathi Mthiyane, uThabo Rakhale, uMxolisi Machupu noLinda Mntambo. Ezinye iindaba ezimnandi kokubuya kukaRoger Sikhakhane ozakusebenza njengomncedisi kaTeboho Moloi. 
UMthiyane ngumdlali odlala ephikweni othembekileyo, wathathwa yi-Orlando Pirates kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo emva kokugqwesa kwiChippa.  
URakhale ngumdlali onesiphiwo esingumangaliso ephikweni xa kuhlaselwa. Uzakusebenza noTeboho Moloi obesebenze naye kwiPirates ngaphambili. 
 UMachupu noMntambo basuka kwiJomo Cosmos, kulindeleke ukuba bancedise kakhulu phaya phambili kwicala lamagowuli.  
Aba badlali bongeza kwabanye abadlali abaninzi abatyikitywe leli qela phambi kokuqala kwale sizini – kodwa uMpengesi uthi ukufika kwaba badlali kubonisa ukuzimisela kwabo.  
“Ukutyikitya kwethu abadlali abane kubonisa mhlophe ukuzimisela kwethu ngokuqinisa indawo yethu kwiTop 8 nokunxanelwa kwethu ukudlala imidlalo yeCaf. Indlela adlala ngayo uRakhale ihambelana ncam neChippa. Siyamamkela noMthiyane. Eli lithuba lakhe lokuvuselela ikhono lakhe lokudlala ibhola kwaye iyayazi inkqubo yeChippa,” utshilo uMpengesi. 
IChippa United izakungquzulana naMaZulu kumdlalo wePSL ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngeCawe eKing Zwelithini Stadium.  
Njengokuba iChippa ifuna amanqaku amathathu, wona AmaZulu azakube ekhangela indlela yokuziphindezela kwiChippa emva kokubethwa ekuqaleni kwesizini eBhayi.  
AmaZulu azinze kwindawo yeshumi elinanye, impumelelo ingawabeka endaweni engcono kakhulu. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoLwesihlanu: Ajax Cape Town vs Maritzburg United @Cape Town Stadium 20:00; Bidvest Wits vs Free State Stars @Bidvest Stadium 20:00 
NgoMgqibelo: Polokwane City vs Mamelodi Sundowns @Peter Mokaba Stadium 15:30; SuperSport United vs Kaizer Chiefs @Lucas Moripe Stadium 18:00; Platinum Stars vs Cape Town City @Royal Bafokeng Stadium 20:15; Orlando Pirates vs Baroka FC @Orlando Stadium 20:15 
NgeCawe: AmaZulu FC vs Chippa United @King Zwelithini Stadium 15:30; Bloemfontein Celtic vs Golden Arrows @Dr Molemela Stadium 15:30

headline: iTS Galaxy ivuthulule iGolden Arrows ngamagowuli amathathu ebaleni layo
text:
UDan “Dance” Malesela neqela lakhe benze ezibukwayo ngale njikalanga ngokubetha iGolden Arrows ebaleni layo emdlalweni obalulekileyo. Iqela elidlala kwiNational First Division, iTS Galaxy, lizenzele imbali ebholeni ekhatywayo eMzantsi Afrika namhlanje ngokuvuthulula Abafana Bes’thende ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye (3-1) emdlalweni obutak’ iintlantsi kwisigaba sesibini eSugar Ray Stadium. USteve Komphela ubatyityimbisele umnwe abadlali bakhe phakathi evekini ngelithi baze bangayijongeli phantsi iTS Galaxy kuba idlala kwinqanaba elingezantsi. Kwenzeke lo nto kanye emva kokuba iGolden Arrows ingakwazanga ukukhusela igowuli layo ehambe phambili ngalo emdlalweni. Umdlalo ulawulwe yi-Arrows kwisigaba sokuqala – kodwa ayikwazanga ukubhalisa ebhedini kwade kwaphela isigaba sokuqala. 
Okuhle ngeTS Galaxy kukuba abadlali bayo khange banikezele noxa bekucaca ukuba badibene neqela elingasentla ngomgangatho. Iqela likaKomphela lihambe phambili emzuzwini wamshumi asixhenxe emva kwegowuli elifakwe nguKnox Mutizwa ngepenela evele ngenxa yokudlaliswa kakubi kukaMathenjwa. Unozinti weGolden Arrows, uMaximilian Mbaeva, unqande amanzi engena endlini izihlandlo eziliqela abadlali beGalaxy befuna int’ebilapha. Igowuli leGalaxy lithe gqi emva kwebhola efakwe nguSandile Zungu ngentloko ezama ukuyikhuphela ngaphandle. Kuye kwanyanzeleka okokuba umdlalo uye kwixesha elongezelelweyo. Kulapho uZakhele Lepasa efake khona amagowuli amabini aqinisekise indawo yeTS Galaxy emdlalweni wokugqibela weNedbank Cup oza kudlalelwa eMoses Mabhida Stadium kwinyanga ezayo. 
   
Golden Arrows:  Mbaeva, Sibisi, Bilankulu, Mzava, Lunga, Dube, Zuke. Venter, Ndwandwe, Venter, Lamola, Mutizwa. 
Amalalela:  Gumede, Jooste. Mathiane, Sibeko, Dube, Male. 
TS Galaxy:  Mpakumpaku, Aubaas, Dube, Cheeks, Meat, Setelele, Mbamba, Bodibe, Nduli, Mdlinzo, Ndlovu. 
 Amalalela:  Phungwayo, Myataza, Shangase, Lepasa, Abrahams, Makgoka, Ngidi.

headline: UBaxter uza kuvavanya abadlali abatsha eZambia
text:
IBafana Bafana izakube iyinxalenye yetumente yamazwe amane eqala ngoLwesine iphele ngeCawe kwilizwe laseZambia.  
Umqeqeshi weBafana, uStuart Baxter, uchonge abadlali abatsha abaliqela azimisele ukubanika ithuba lokudlala namazwe angoomakhelwane afana neZambia, iZimbabwe neAngola.  
Nakubeni uBaxter enomnqweno wokuvavanya abadlali abatsha ababizele kwiqela lesizwe – kodwa unoxanduva lokuqinisekisa ukuba wakha iqela eliluqilima.  
Njengokuba uMzantsi Afrika ungakwazanga ukuya kwindebe yehlabathi (2019 FIFA World Cup) ezakube iseRussia kwinyanga yeSilimela – ngoku umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana kufuneka aqinisekise ukuba ilizwe liyaya kwitumente yamazwe ezwekazi le Afrika (Africa Cup of Nations). 
UStuart Baxter yindoda engoyikiyo ukuzama izinto ezintsha ezinokuncedisana neqela – kodwa ngoba le midlalo ifike ngexesha elibi lokuphela kwesizini yePSL, kufuneka aqinisekise ukuba uyakuphepha ukonzakala kwabadlali.  
“Sigqibe kwelokuba sinike wonke umdlali ithuba lokudlala kule tumente. Andifuni uRamahlwe Mphahlele abuyele eqeleni lakhe edlale imidlalo emibini kwisithuba seentsuku ezintathu (utsho ezekelisa). Abadlali abadala babalulekile ngoba ngabo ababonisa indlela abatsha. Ndiyafuna ukuphumelela, nelizwe lilindele impumelelo kuthi – kodwa yonke into kufuneka siyenze ngononophelo,” utshilo uBaxter koonondaba ekuqaleni kwale veki. 
UMphahlele, ohleli iinyanga eziliqela ngaphandle kokudlala ibhola, ubuyela kwiqela likaBaxter emva kokudlala kakuhle kwiKaizer Chiefs. Lo kaMphahlele ngomnye wabadlali ekulindeleke kujongwe kubo xa iBafana Bafana izama ukuphumelela le tumente yamazwe amane. URama uthe iqela lisakhathazwe kukungayi kwiFIFA World Cup – kodwa wathi alikho ixesha lokuhlala kulo nto.  
“Xa ungumdlali kufuneka uvuthulule uye phambili emva kokuwa. Akufuneki abadlali abatsha basifumane sisathe khunubembe. Kufuneka sibakhuthaze ukuze bazibone ukuba bangalinceda iqela lesizwe,” utshilo uMphahlele. 
UMzantsi Afrika udibana neAngola kumdlalo wokuqala ngoLwesine ngentsimbi yesithathu, iZambia ixikixana neZimbabwe kumdlalo wokuqala ngentsimbi yokuqala eLevy Mwanawasa Stadium. 
Oonozinti: Itumeleng Khune, Darren Keet, Brendon Peterson. 
Abasemva: Reeve Frosler, Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Thulani Hlatshwayo, Motjeka Madisha, Daniel Cardoso, Buhle Mkhwanazi, Innocent Maela, S’fiso Hlanti. 
Esiswini: Dean Furman, Siphesihle Ndlovu, Kamohelo Mokotjo, Teboho Mokoena, Bongani Zungu, Aubrey Modiba, Sibusiso Vilakazi, Thembinkosi Lorch, Keagan Dolly, Phakamani Mahlambi, Themba Zwane 
Iifolosi: Percy Tau, Lebo Mothiba, Ryan Moon

headline: Udukile umdlali weChiefs
text:
Akaziwa apho akhoyo umdlali weChiefs ngumqeqeshi.  
UJames Kotei kuthiwa uduke nezwe emva kokuvakala kwamahumhum athe uza kuthengiswa yiChiefs.  
Lo mdlali waseGhana ngomnye wabadlali abambalwa abagaleleka eNaturena phambi kokuqala kwesizini yePSL ka2019/20 kodwa yena akadlali kwiChiefs.  
Noxa wayebabazwa njengabamaziyo ekufikeni kwakhe eMzantsi Afrika, kodwa akakwazanga ukumelana nokhuphiswano lwamadoda afana noWillard Katsande noGeorge Maluleka.  
Ethetha neentatheli kutshanje, uErnst Middendorp uthe akamazi nokuba uphi uKotei kwaye akekho eNaturena.  
“Andingeze ndikwazi ukutsho ukuba uphi ngoba akekho apha. Andimazi apho akhoyo. Akekho apha namhlanje futhi nayizolo ebengekho,” utshilo uModdendorp ethetha eNaturena kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Kuthiwa iChiefs incwase ukumthengisa, endaweni yakhe ifake uAnthony Akumu waseKenya oshiye iZESCO United kutshanje.

headline: Mangweni: Iza kufika siyilindele iBoland!
text:
IBorder Bulldogs isebenzisa imidlalo yeSupersport Rugby Challenge njengamalungiselelo weCurrie Cup.  
Kwiveki ephelileyo, iBulldogs itywatyushwe yiWestern Province ngo’48-28 emdlalweni obuseOld Selbornian.  
Umqeqeshi weBulldogs, uTiger Mangweni, uthe iqela lakhe lizilungiselela imidlalo ezayo yeCurrie Cup.  
“Bendizilindele iziphumo ezinje kulo mdlalo. Ndiyazazi iingxaki ebesijongene nazo phambi kwetumente. Sendizixelele ukuba siza kusebenzisa le tumente njengamalungiselelo weCurrie Cup,” utshilo uMangweni. 
UMangweni uthe nangona iqela lakhe libethiwe kodwa kuninzi okuncomekayo kubadlali bakhe.  
“Uninzi lwaba badlali alinawo amava kweli zinga kodwa kuninzi ekuncomekayo abakwenzayo,” utshilo uMangweni. 
 IBulldogs yamkela iBoland Cavalliers emdlalweni wombhoxo eBuffalo City Stadium ebusuku ngoLwesihlanu. 
 “Imidlalo emibini esiyidlalileyo indibonisile into ekufuneka siyilungise nokuba siza kuyilungisa njani. IBoland iza kufika siyilindele,” utshilo uMangweni eqinisekile. 
IWestern Province iyiphumelele yomibini imidlalo yokuvula iSuperSport Challenge. Umqeqeshi weWestern Province, uJerome Paarwater, uthe bazimisele ukuyiphumelela iSuperSport Challenge. 
 “Isokolisile iBorder emdlalweni kodwa lo nto ibancedile abadlali bethu ukuze bazazi ukuba basemdlalweni. Zininzi iimpazamo abazenzileyo, nangona kunjalo, ndinalo ithemba lokuba sisesekhondweni elihle lokuyiphumelela iSuperSport Challenge,” utshilo uPaarwater. 
Komnye umdlalo, iEastern Province Elephants ibethe iSouth Western District Eagles ngo’59-24. Iziphumo zeSuper League ekwiBorder: Berlin Tigers 8-5 Buffs, WSU All Blacks 13-8 Breakers, United Brothers 36-0 Old Collegians, Ocean Sweepers 18-5 Ntlaza Lions.

headline: Umqeqeshi uvuyela abadlali baseGcuwa abaye eJamani
text:
Umqeqeshi weqela laseGcuwa, iThunderbirds Ladies, uchumulancile ngabadlali bakhe abahlanu abantingele eJamani kunye neqela lase Mpuma Koloni labasetyhini.UThembalethu Apleni uvuyela abadlali bakhe bachongwe yiSouth Africa Football Association (SAFA) ukuba babeyinxalenye yeqela le phondo eliyokudlala imidlalo yobuhlubo namaqela waseJamani. 
UMaxwele Siphosethu, Skeyi Siyamthanda,Nanasele Onelisa, uKeto Yonela kunye noDekeda Zimasa ngabadlali beThunderbirds Ladies, abachongiweyo. U-Apleni uthi ukuchongwa kwabadlali bakhe abahlanu kuchaza ukhula kwebhola yabo kwaye lonto uyayivuyela. 
“Ngo-2014 kwachongwa abadlali abathathu, kulo unyaka kuchongwe abahlanu nto leyo esichulumancisa kwaye esicinga ukub ibonakalisa ukuphucuka komngangatho wethu xa siwuthelekisa nakuqala” utshilo Apleni Kwisizini ephelileyo yeSasol Coastal Stream League, iintwazana zika-Apleni ziphethe isizini zihleli kwindawo yesibini kuluhlu lwamaqela ela nqanaba emva kokuba intshatheli yaba liqela laseBhayi, iCity Lads. Ukanti kulena isizini iThunderbirds Ladies sele 
 idlale imidlalo emithandathu yayiphumelele yonke kwaye abadlali bayo ababini, uZimasa Dekeda noNanasele Onelisa babizwe kwiqela lesizwe labasetyhini abaneminyaka engaphantsi kwamashumi amabini. Apleni uthi oko kucacisa mhlophe ukuba uxhomile umngangatho wabo kule sizini. Ngabadlali abalisumi elinesihlanu abathe bachongwa kumaqela awohlukeneyo eSasol Coastal Stream League /Sasol Inland Stream League ukuba bayokumela iphondo kwimidlalo emithatha yobuhlobo abazakuyidlala namaqela waseJamani. 
Abadlali bazakuchitha intsuku ezilishumi bekhenkethile kwilizwe laseJamani njengokuba benduluke ngoLwesihlanu kweli. Olu hamba lulandela intsebenziswano eyatyikitywa phantsi ngurhumente weli phondo kunye nowaseJamani ngenjongo zokwabelana ngolwazi malunga namagqiinga wokuphuhlisa imidlalo phakathi kwalamazwe mabani.

headline: MTN8: UStuart Baxter uncwase ukuvula ngeMamelodi Sundowns!
text:
Amaqela asibhoza akwiTop 8 aza kulwela indebe yeMTN 8 nezizigidi ezisibhozo zerandi (R8-m) emidlalweni ngempelaveki. Imidlalo yeMTN 8 itshayelela isizini entsha yeDStv Premiership eza kuqala kwiveki ezayo. Owona mdlalo ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu uphakathi kweMamelodi Sundowns neKaizer Chiefs ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngeCawe, eLucas Moripe Stadium. Kulapho iSundowns iza kuzama khona ukufumana isiqalo esihle sendebe engekayiphumeleli nangona ikwazile ukuziphindaphinda ezinye iindebe kule minyaka elishumi igqithileyo. Umqeqeshi weDowns wesibini, uRulani Mokwena, uwuncomile umsebenzi owenziwe ngabadlali bakhe phambi kokuqala kwesizini watsho esongeza ngelithi bafuna ukwakha iqela eliza kuwasokolisa kakhulu amanye amaqela. “Amalungiselelo wesizini entsha ahambe kakuhle. Esikwenzayo ngoku kukunceda abadlali abatsha ukuze bakwazi ukuqhelana nendlela esisebenza ngayo,” utshilo uMokwena. 
Amasandawana afumene abadlali abaliqela kwaye kulindeleke athathe apho ayeke khona kwisizini egqithileyo ayivale ngendlela encumisayo. “Sifuna ukuba liqela elomeleleyo. Iqela eliza kubetha amanye amaqela ngeendlela ezininzi. Umgama esesiwuhambile uyasonelisa,” utshilo uMokwena. Emva kweminyaka engasafumani iindebe, Amakhosi akhwebe uStuart Baxter ukuze akwazi ukubuyisa isidima sawo. Okuhle ngeChiefs kukuba iya emdlalweni ikhuthazekile emva kokubetha iPirates emdlalweni weCarling Black Label Cup kwiveki ephelileyo. Akukho bani owaziyo kodwa ukuba ingayibetha na iSundowns ukuze inike ithemba abalandeli bayo abanxanelwe indebe. UBaxter uvumile ukuba iqela lakhe alikagqibeleli – kodwa ukuphumelela ingayinto entle. “Abadlali basebenza ngokuzimisela enkampini nangona singenalo kakuhle ixesha. Kunokwenzeka ukuhlangana kweqela kuthatha iiveki – kodwa ukuba singadlala kakuhle ngeCawe, mhlawumbi singalwela iindebe,” uthsilo uBaxter. 
Komnye umdlalo ngeCawe, AmaZulu adibana neCape Town City ngentsimbi yesithandathu emalanga eMoses Mabhida Stadium. Kwakutshayelela iGolden Arrows neSuperSport emdlalweni oyakube usePrincess Magogo Stadium ngo-15:00 ngoMgqibelo. Omnye umdlalo omkhulu ngophakathi kwe-Orlando Pirates neSwallows FC. Lo mdlalo ubekelwe intsimbi yesithandathu emalanga e-Orlando Stadium. Iinyoni zaseDube ziza kufuna ukuzicacisa emva kokudlala kakuhle kwisizini ephelileyo – kanti yona iPirates ifuna ukukhusela indebe yayo yokuqala phantsi kukaJosef Zinnbauer.

headline: ITexus ziintshatsheli ezivunyiweyo eMdantsane!
text:
Nangona iveki ephelileyo ibi yeyokuphumla kwabanye abantu – kodwa iinkokeli zoMdantsane Local Football Association bezixakekiswe luphuhliso lwabadlali abasakhasayo.  
Amaqela ebhola ekhatywayo anabadlali abadala ababalelwa kumashumi amane akhuphisene kwitumente ebiququzelelwe ngulo mbutho olawula ibhola eMdantsane.  
Le tumente ebixhaswa yiBuffalo City Municipality, ibiquka nehlokondiba lamaqela abadlali abaneminyaka engaphantsi kweshumi elinesithathu, ishumi elinesihlanu neshumi elinesixhenxe. 
Owona mdlalo obujongwe kakhulu ubuphakathi kweGreen Lovers neTexus.  
La maqela mabini athe azibonakalisa kule tumente ukuba ngawona anamandla kwibhola yaseMdantsane. Ngaphezulu kwazo zonke izinto ezenzekileyo kule tumente kukuba abadlali beelokishi ngokwahlukana kwazo bafumene ithuba lokuzivavanya nokuqaqambisa izakhono zabo.  
Umdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi ubumhle futhi abadlali bamaqela omabini badlale ngokuzimisela. ITexus ibonisile ukuba ifuna ukuphumelela zisuka ngokuthi ifake amagowuli amabini kwisiqingatha sokuqala emdlalweni. 
Loo magowuli anike iTexus ithemba lokugoduka nendebe. Amagowuli alandele emva komdlalo omhle odlalwe ziziquququ zeTexus phantse sonke isiqingatha sokuqala.  
Emva kokufumana iingcebiso ngexesha lokuphumla, iGreen Lovers ibuye ngamandla kwisigaba sesibini. Abadlali baqale ngokudlala umdlalo odibeneyo besebenzisa izakhono zabo namendu.  
Uxinizelelo olufakwe yiLovers kwisigaba sesibini lulo olwenze yafumana amagowuli amabini ngokukhawuleza kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo.  
Lo nto inyanzele umdlalo ukuba uye kumapenela apho iTexus iphumelele ngo’4-3, yaba ithwaliswa isithsaba sobuntshatsheli ekupheleni kwemini. 
Nangona kungekho lula ukuqokelela ulutsha kule mihla – kodwa abaququzeleli bale tumente bonelisekile yindlela abaqhube ngayo. Amaqela aphumeleleyo ngokohlukana kwamanqanaba azuze iindebe, iimbasa nemali. 
Le tumente ibiliqonga elihle lokuqaqambisa izakhono zabadlali bebhola ekhatywayo.

headline: Faf: Lenze iimpazamo iqela, kodwa lilwile
text:
Ukapteni weProteas, uFaf du Plessis, uzivumile iimpazamo ezenziwe liqela lakhe emdlalweni elibethiweyo kuwo, kodwa uzingomba isifuba ngomsebenzi omhle owenziwe ngoogxa bakhe.  
UMzantsi Afrika uvuthululwe yiNgilane ngemitsi elikhulu elinamashumi asibhozo anethoba (189) emdlalweni wovavanyo obuseNewlands Stadium, eKapa.  
Iziphumo zomdlalo ogqithileyo zithetha ukuthi omabini amazwe aphumelele kabini kuchungechunge lwemidlalo yovavanyo esaya phambili.  
Amakhwenkwe oMzantsi Afrika aye emdlalweni ngoLwesibini wale veki efuna imitsi engaphaya kwamakhulu amathathu, kodwa akakwazanga ukuyifumana ngenxa yeempazamo nokukelema kwawo amaNgesi emdlalweni.  
Nangona kunjalo, uDu Plessis uya emdlalweni olandelayo enethemba emva komdlalo ophucukileyo weProteas. 
Phakathi emdlalweni, uKapteni noQuinton de Kock baphise ngoothinti ababini bonke, into enike amandla iNgilane ebizimisele kakhulu emdlalweni ewuphumeleleyo kakuhle.  
“Ukuphisa ngoothinti ababini ebaleni ebelisivumela kokona kwenze umahluko emdlalweni. Iqela lenze iimpazamo emdlalweni kodwa likwazile ukulwa kwelinye icala. Nakubeni kunjalo, ukuba ungajonga indlela ebesidlala ngayo kwisithuba senyanga ndingathi besingenalo tu ulwamvila.  
Njengeqela elinabadlali abatsha kwimidlalo yovavanyo, kodwa kukhona ukuphucuka okubonakalayo emdlalweni wethu. Yeyona nto ethe yandonwabisa leyo kwezi ntsuku zimbini zidlulileyo. Ngeke igqibelele ngokukhawuleza indlela esiqhokra ngayo kwaye neempazamo ziseza kubakho kodwa kwimidlalo yovavanyo, umntu kufuneka abenomonde zide zilunge izinto,” utshilo uDu Plessis emva komdlalo eKapa. 
Umdlalo olandelayo wovavanyo uya eBhayi ngomhla weshumi elinesithandathu. Owokugqibela uza kubanjelwa eGoli ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesine kule nyanga.  
Kulindeleke uMzantsi Afrika ulwe kube mdaka iisali ngoba uzama ukubuyisa isidima sawo emva kokukhululiswa ijezi kwakusasa kwiNdebe yeHlabathi kunyaka ophelileyo.

headline: Langeni: Sizakuzithatha zibembini iindebe kule sizini
text:
Omnye wabalandeli beKaizer Chiefs abaphambili kwimicimbi yabalandeli kwi-East London Kaizer Chiefs Supporters Branch ulithembile iqela lakhe ukuba lakuthi lenze ngcono kule sizini.  
USiyasanga “Sandla” Langeni waseGcuwa kodwa ohlala eMonti usibalisela ngendlela yakhe njengomlandeli weKhosi. 
Pedro Mapelo: Siyakwamkela kweli phephandaba. 
Siyasanga “Sandla” Langeni: Ndiyabulela kakhulu Bhuti. 
PM: Gqaba-gqaba, watsalwa yintoni apha kwiChiefs? 
SL: Mna ndingatsho ukuthi ndikhulele ekhayeni eliyilandelayo ibhola ekhatywayo futhi elinabantu abathanda iChiefs.  
Njengomntu okhule noosisi, iChiefs ibindinika la nto yokoyama. Kodwa eyona nto ibalulekileyo yimfundiso yaMakhosi: uthando noxolo, ezo zinto zindenza ndibambelele kakhulu kuwo. 
PM: Kubaluleke ngantoni ukuzibandakanya namasebe abalandeli (Supporters Branches)? 
SL: Kula masebe abalandeli siyafundisana ngeendlela zokwenza izinto, siyancedana kakhulu ngoba singabantu sahlukene: abanye abantu banezinto logama abanye behlelelekile.  
Enye into emnandi kukuba isebe labalandeli yeyona ndawo ibalinganisayo abantu. Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekuncedaneni thina. 
PM: Ulindele ntoni kwiChiefs kule sizini? 
SL: Ndiqinisekile, kule sizini sizakuyifumana indebe yePSL. Kwezishiyekileyo ngoku singafumana ezimbini kule sizini. Sizakuqala ngeTelkom Knockout le. 
PM: Kutheni abalandeli bengayi nje emidlalweni? 
SL: Phakathi kweengxaki abahlangabezana nazo abalandeli bebhola yindlela yokuya emabaleni: phakathi evekini kunzima ukufumana izinto zokhwela eziya kwiindawo abahlala kuzo.  
Lo mba ufuna kubekho ingxoxo phakathi kukarhulumente nabaphetheyo ebholeni. Enye into ebalekisa abantu yibhola enomtsalane edlalwayo ngamaqela akwiPSL kule mihla.

headline: ULukhanyo yinkokheli entsha yeCell C Sharks!
text:
Zisuka nje enyakeni omtsha, uLukhanyo Am unyuselwe liqela lakhe. Indodana yakwa-Am, 26, ibekwe ngokusesikweni njengoKapteni omtsha weCell C Sharks phambi kokuqala kwesizini yeSuper Rugby yalo nyaka.  
Ukunikwa kukaLukhanyo uxanduva lokukhokela iqela lombhoxo laseThekwini kwenzeka kanye emva kokuba encede AmaBhokobhoko aphumelele iNdebe yeHlabathi ekuzeni kuphela kuka2019.  
Le ndedeba, ephuma eQonce kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni, yaqala ukuziqaqambisa embhoxweni kwiBorder Bulldogs waze waya kwiSouthern Kings ezinze eBhayi phambi kokuya kwiSharks, emva kwesithuba esingunyaka kwakucaca okokuba isakhono sakhe sokudlala umbhoxo siyakhula.  
Isibhengezo ngokunyuselwa kukaLukhanyo asothusanga ngoba ungumdlali ozimiseleyo kakhulu emsebenzini wakhe kwaye samkelwe ngovuyo olukhulu ngabalandeli bombhoxo elizweni jikelele. 
Naye uLukhanyo ukwamkele ngovuyo ukunikwa kwakhe umsebenzi wokukhokela elinye lamaqela aphambili embhoxweni waseMzantsi Afrika.  
“Ukuchongwa kwam liwonga elikhulu. Sineqela eliluqilima, elimanyeneyo nelinabadlali abazimisele ukwenza umahluko obonakalayo. Siza kuqinisekisa okokuba kuyo yonke into esiyenzayo, sibeka iqela phambili,” uthethe loo mazwi uLukhanyo emva kokuchongwa kwakhe kwiSharks.  
Umqeqeshi weSharks, uSean Everitt, ubalule ukuzinikela kukaLukhanyo njengenye yezinto ezithe zanefuthe kwisigqibo sokunikwa kwakhe isikhundla esiphezulu. 
 “ULukhanyo simkhethe kuba engumdlali oqheleneyo nempumelelo, unefuthe eqeleni kwaye ungumntu ozinikeleyo kwiCell C Sharks. Andithandabuzi nakancinci, abadlali abasakhulayo baza kukhuthazeka sisikhokelo sakhe. ULukhanyo uza kuncediswa ngabanye abadlali abaziinkokeli,” utshilo umqeqeshi. 
USean Everitt uthe abadlali abafana noLouis Schreuder, uAndre Esterhuizen, uMakazole Mapimpi, uThomas du Toit noCurwin Bosch baza kuqinisekisa okokuba uLukhanyo ufumana inkxaso epheleleyo xa kufuneka kuthathwe izigqibo ezibalulekileyo kwiCell C Sharks imidlalo yesizini ka2020 yonke.

headline: IChippa United imkhombise umnyango uClinton Larsen
text: Ezingenayo ngale ntsasa zithi iChippa United imkhombise umnyango umqeqeshi wayo, uClinton Larsen. Ukugxothwa kukaLarsen kulandela ukubethwa kweChippa United ngo’2-1 emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership obubanjelwe e-Orlando Stadium ngoMgqibelo odlulileyo. ULarsen ugxothwa emva kwemidlalo emihlanu qha kwaye iChippa liqela lokuqala kwiPSL eseligxothe umqeqeshi ukusukela oko kuqale isizini entsha. Ihleli kwindawo yeshumi elinesithathu iChippa emva kokudlala ntanganye emidlalweni emithathu nokuphulukana nemidlalo emibini. Ngokwengxelo ekhutshwe yiKickOff.com, uLarsen uthi ugxothwe ngenxa yeziphumo.

headline: Kuncedwa ulutsha ngemidlalo eCawa
text:
Iqhubele phambili imidlalo yeNdlambe Netball League eyenziwe ngamaqela asibhozo kummandla waseNdlambe. Le Ndlambe League iqale kwinyanga engaphaya kwale iphelileyo. 
 Umlawuli weNdlambe League, uSiphokazi Mkrakra, uxelele iintatheli ukuba uncedo balufumene kumasipala, yiyo lo nto imidlalo eTiti Jonas Stadium/Ground kwindawo yaseNdlovini.  
Uqhube wathi amaqela asuka kwiindawo ezingaphandle kweCawa aqashelwa izithuthi lisebe leZemidlalo.” Lo kaMkrakra ukwaveze ukuba zininzi izinto abangenazo ingakumbi amanzi okusela xa abadlali bedlala.  
Utsho esithi unobangela wokuba kubekhona iNdlambe Netball League kule ndawo kungokuba bafuna ukuqokelela ulutsha ndaweninye futhi bakholelwa ukuba ezemidlalo zenza ludlalele kude ezintweni ezingalunganga, kwaye zikwagcina nemizimba isempilweni. 
 Iqela elihamba phambili kula maqela yiVintage Gels, iqela laseKenton, elithe laphumelela ngamanqaku alishumi elinesithathu(13) kwasixhenxe ngokuthi libethe iBarthust elikwindawo yesine. Iqela elibizwa ngokuba yi-Ukhanyo esemsileni, izinto zilihambele kakubi nanjengoko libethwe yiBucks ngamanqaku amathathu eqandeni.  
La maqela asibhozo abandakanyeka kwiNdlambe Netball League: yiFish River, Alex, Bucks, Ukhanyo, Port Alfred Masters, Amaqhawe, Vintage neBarthust. Amaqhawe abethwe yiPA Masters ngamagowuli alishumi elinanye kwasibhozo likhalazele iPA Masters ngokuhlala idlalisa abadlali engengabo abayo oko.  
UZandile Memani, umdlali waMaqhawe, eveze ukuba eli qela ngumkhwa walo ukusoloko lidlalisa abadlali engengabo abalo. Umqeqeshi wePA Masters, uNobesuthu Magquntule, khange akhanyele kodwa engakhe avume kukuba abadlali beqela lakhe bahambele eCawa.

headline: Obedlalela iChiefs uya kwiPirates
text:
Kulindeleke anxibe isikipa seBucs obefudula engumdlali weKaizer Chiefs.  
Umdlali wasesiswini, uHendrick Ekstein, kuthiwa uya kwiPirates emva kokulahlwa yiChiefs phambi kokuvalwa kwesizini ephelileyo.  
Kuke kwakho ukungavani phakathi kukaHendrick neChiefs ngenxa yemali ebekuthiwa uyayifuna phambi kokutyikitya isivumelwano esitsha kodwa ekugqibeleni wakhululwa emva kokuvakala kweengxelo ezithi uya kwiPirates.

headline: Uqalile ukusebenza unobhala weFIFA
text:
Unobhala jikelele wombutho olawula ibhola ekhatywayo kwihlabathi iFIFA, nongumntu wokuqala wasetyhini ukubamba esi sikhundla uqalile ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe kulo mbutho wambethwe ziingxaki. 
Inzalelwane yaseSenegal uFatma Samoura uthi eyonanto yokuqala ajamelene nayo kukuba afumane abantu abazakuvala izikhundla ezingenabantu. Ezi zikhundla ziquka esomntu ozakujongana nezimali nese- chief compliance officer. 
USamoura ebebhengezwe njengomntu ozakubamba esi sikhundla kwinyanga ephelileyo, kwisibhengezo esikhulu esenziwa ngumongameli omtsha weFIFA uGianni Infantino. U-Infantino ukwiphulo lokulungisa zonke iingxaki zeFIFA emva kokuba ethathe iintambo kuSepp Blatter. 
Phambi kokuza kwesi sikhundla uSamoura usebenze kwi-United Nations iminyaka engamashumi amabini. Bobabini abasebenze phambi kwakhe njengoonobhala, uJerome Valke noMarkus Kattner bagxothwe ngenxa yezityholo zobuqhophololo. 
UValcke uyalandelwa ngezityholo zokwaphula umthetho ekunye noSepp Blatter. 
USamora uthi ibalulekile into yokubuyiswa kwesidima seFIFA, kulandela izityholo kunye namatyala obuqhophololo agujululwe kulo mbutho kunyaka ophelileyo. “Into yesibini ekufuneka ndiyijonge kakuhle ngabasebenzi. Abebesoloko bephantsi koxinizelelo, kwezi nyanga zilishumi elinambini zidlulileyo, ngenxa yala mabholo obuqhophololo.” Utshilo. kudliwano ndlebe lweFIFA. 
Lo kaSamoura ukwanikwe negunya lokuba athathe izigqibo kwimiba elolu hlobo, into ethetha ukuba uzakusebenza kwanje ngengqonyela.

headline: UMzantsi Afrika ziingqongqo zamanye amazwe kwindebe yehlabathi!
text:
Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, iqela loMzantsi Afrika leqakamba ziingqongqo zamanye amazwe kwindebe yehlabathi. Lo nto icace gca emva kokuba iProteas ibethwe yi-India ngoothinti abathandathu bonke namhlanje eSouthampton kwilizwe laseNgilane. Ukapteni weProteas, uFaf du Plessis, uphumelele itosi namhlanje wakhetha ukuqhokra kuqala into angayenzanga emidlalweni emibini egqithileyo. UMzantsi Afrika ukhutshwe wenze ibathwana lamakhulu amabini anamashumi amabini anesixhenxe (227/9) lemitsi kuwe oothinti abalithoba bonke. Lowo ibingengomsebenzi onzima konke konke kwi-India ebiqala ukudlala kwindebe yehlabathi namhlanje. Ukungakwazi ukufika kumakhulu amathathu kuvele kwawubeka endaweni embi ngakumbi uMzantsi Afrika obufuna ukuphumelela umdlalo wawo wokuqala eNgesi. 
UKagiso Rabada uzamile ukuphizamisa umdlali we-India ophambili, uRohit Sharma, ngeebhola ezinzima – kodwa elo linge lakhe aliphumelelanga ngenxa yobuchule bakhe (umdlali wase-India) bokubetha ibhola. Uye wabaxaka abadlali boMzantsi Afrika umfo kaSharma wade wafumana ikhulu elinamashumi amabini anesibini (122) emitsi emdlalweni. Omnye umdlali we-India oqhube kakuhle emdlalweni ibe nguDhoni – oqhokre imitsi engamashumi amabini anesine (34). Nangona imidlalo iseliqela ezayo – kodwa akusekho themba kwiProteas ngenxa yendlela embi edlale ngayo emidlalweni emithathu. Amadoda ebekuthenjelwe kuwo anjengoHashim Amla noQuinton de Kock akakwazanga ukwenza umahluko namhlanje – kowona mdlalo ebekunyanzelekile uMzantsi Afrika uwuphumelele ukuze kubuye ukuzithemba ebadlalini. Mhlawumbi ukungabikho kukaDale Steyn, ongazukudlala kwindebe yehlabathi ngenxa yokonzakala, kunomthelela kwindlela iqela likaFaf du Plessis elidlala ngayo.

headline: UKomphela ubona owayeqeqesha iFree State Stars njengesidenge esoyisileyo!
text:
Umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uSteve Komphela, ukhwele ezehlela kutshaba lakhe olukhulu uLuc Eymale owayefudula eqeqesha iFree State Stars – ethotyiselwe kwinqanaba elisezantsi. UKomphela usebenzise amazwi arhabaxa ngethuba ephendula imibuzo ephoswe kuye ziintatheli emva kokuthotyiselwa kweqela awaziqaqambisa kulo njengomqeqeshi kwiPremier Soccer League. Ukutsarhana ngamazwi phakathi kukaKomphela noka-Eymael kwaqala kwisithuba esingaphaya konyaka. Esaqeqesha iFree State Stars, uEymael waqhayisa ngelithi yena ufumene indebe kodwa kusekho abaneshumi elinesihlanu leminyaka bengekafumani nenye indebe. 
Okwenza kwakubi ngakumbi kungethuba uEymael efuna umsebenzi kwiKaizer Chiefs – ngelo xesha uSteve Komphela esengumqeqeshi. “ULuc makazifundise ukubahlonipha abanye abantu. Akasoze ahlale ixesha elide kakhulu ebholeni umntu ongababoniyo abanye abantu. Kufanele ayazi indawo emfaneleyo. Soze eze apha kweli lizwe, afike enze into ayithandayo. Khumbula, ngoku ndithetha ngohlobo lomntu anguye. Phambi kokungena ebholeni, mhlawumbi – kwakufanele kubekho indlela yokuhlola ubume bengqondo yomntu ngamnye,” utshilo uKomphela. 
Emva kokuphumelela iNedbank Cup kunyaka ephelileyo esengumqeqeshi weFree State Stars, uLuc Eymael, wanyanzelisa iChiefs neSuperSport United ukuba zimqeqeshe ingaphelanga iveki – kuba loo maqela ayekhangela abaqeqeshi abatsha. Lo nto ibonwe njengobudenge obuxakileyo nguKomphela. “ULuc ngumntu ongenayo imbeko konke konke. Umntu onjalo ke uyafuna ukufakwa endleleni. Emva kokuphumelela iNedbank waya kwiChiefs nakwiSuperSport wathi: ndininika iveki nindiqeshe, kungenjalo ndakube ndimkile. Yiyeke eyokungabikho kwembeko, uthini kubantu afuna bamqeshe? Yayibubudene obuya,” utshilo uKomphela ethetha neentatheli emva komdlalo wokugqibela. Abafana Bes’thende babethwe ngegowuli elinye eqandeni yiBidvest Wits ebaleni labo.

headline: iSenegal itywatyushe oosotheko kwaphela ngabo kwiFifa World Cup!
text:
Iintshatsheli zeAfrika, iSenegal, zitywatyushe iQatar ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye (3-1) emdlalweni wetumente yehlabathi obutshisa eAl Thumama Stadium emalanga namhlanje. Ukuphumelela kweSenegal kuyinika amandla okulwela ukuya kwisigaba esilandelayo setumente yehlabathi xa idibana ne-Ecuador emdlalweni olandelayo. Nangona iQatar iye emdlalweni iyokulwela ukungakhutshwa kwangoko kwitumenete yehlabathi – kodwa uxinizelelo belukwiSenegal kakhulu ngoba ibonwa njengelona qela laseAfrika elingenza ngcono kwitumente yalo nyaka. Umqeqeshi weSenegal, uAliou Cisse, uzohlwaye kakhulu emva kweempezamo ezikhokelele ekubethweni kweqela lakhe yiNetherlands ekuqaleni kwale veki. 
Namhlanje uye emdlalweni efuna ukulungisa iziphene nokubuyisa isidima seSenegal. Isigaba sokuqala siphele iSenegal ihamba phambili ngegowuli elifakwe nguBoulaye Dia. Abadlali abafana noJakobs Ismaila noMendy bakhe bazama ukuyishukumisa iQatar ebizimisele ngendlela emangalisayo namhlanje. Abadlali beSenegal baqhubele phambili nokuyicinezela iQatar kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Injongo yama-Afrika ibikukufumana igowuli lokuphumelela umdlalo akugqiba atshixe. Kubalulekile ukuphawula ukuba abadlali beQatar bazilwele, ingakumbi kwisigaba sesibini – ngoba nangona bebesemva ngamagowuli – lona ithemba lokufumana igowuli belikhona. 
USalaby noDiedhiou ngabanye wamadoda aqinisekise ukuba iSenegal ayonakalelwa emdlalweni wanamhlanje. UFamara Diedhiou ufake igowuli leSenegal lesibini. Emzuzwini wamashumi asixhenxe anesibhozo, uMohammed Muntari ufake igowuli elihle leQatar. Igowuli liyihluphezile (iQatar) layinika nethemba lokufumana elinye – kodwa uCheikh Dieng ucime kwaloo ntlantsi yethemba ngokufaka igowuli lesithathu leSenegal kwaphela ngayo iQatar kwindebe yehlabathi. Ngokuza iza kudlala neNetherlands simahla ngoba seyibethwe emidlalweni emibini kuGoup A. ISenegal, ebe liqela lokuqala eliphuma eAfrika, iza kulwela ukubetha iEcuador emdlalweni olandelayo ukuze iye phambili – kodwa naleyo iya kuxhomekeka kweminye imidlalo kaGroup A.

headline: Owayedlalela iKaizer Chiefs unomnqweno wokudlala ibhola ekhatywayo kwakhona!
text:
UWiseman Meyiwa unomnqweno wokubuyela ebholeni kwakhona. Le dyongwana yaKwaZulu-Natal, yabeka phantsi ebholeni ekhatywayo ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka emva kokubandakanyeka engozini yemoto kunyaka ophelileyo. UMeyiwa, 19, owazalelwa ePetermaritzburg, ebengumdlali weKaizer Chiefs othembisayo kakhulu emva kokuzenzela igama phantsi kwesandla sikaSteve Komphela. Ikhono lakhe lokudlala ibhola ekhatywayo linqanyulwe lisaqala ukuntshula yingozi yemoto kwaye oogqirha bathi ngeke aphinde akwazi ukudlala ibhola. Nangani ehamba ngesitulo esinamavili – kodwa uMeyiwa unethemba lommangaliso oyakuthi ufezekise umnqweno wakhe wokudla ibhola kwakhona ebomini bakhe. 
“Ndiya kukhumbula ukwenza eyona nto endiyithandayo ebaleni,” utshilo uMeyiwa kuTwitter ecaphula encwadini yezibhalo ezingcwele. UMeyiwa uphazanyiswe yingozi ebomini bakhe emva kokudlala ixesha elifutshane kwiChiefs emncedileyo ukuze afumane ithuba lokudlalela Amajita kwiitumente ezifana ne-Under 20 Africa Cup of Nations neFifa Under-20 World Cup kunyaka ophelileyo. Into eyehlela uWiseman Meyiwa yabonwa njengelahleko enkulu ebholeni ekhatywayo ngoba ebengumdlali onekamva eliqaqambileyo kakhulu.

headline: Idabi leChiefs nePirates liphumela kwiDiski Challenge
text:
Njengokuba amaqela adlala kwiPSL esathathe ikhefu, abantu baza kufumana omnye umlo ophakathi kweKaizer Chiefs neOrlando Pirates.  
La maqela mabini aza kuswantsulisana emdlalweni weDiski Challenge oza kube useDobsonville Stadium ngo’15:00 ngoMgqibelo.  
Umdlalo wale veki udlalwa ngamaqela anabadlali abaselula ngokweminyaka kunye nabambalwa abadala abangafumani kakuhle ithuba lokudlala kumaqela amadala.  
Idabi laseSoweto liza kuqala apho liyeke khona kwiveki ephelileyo emva kokuba iChiefs ibethe iPirates ngo’3-2 emdlalweni weAbsa Premiership obubanjelwe eFNB Stadium.  
Okwenzeke eNasrec kwiveki ephelileyo kulindeleke kube nefuthe emdlalweni wangoMgqibelo ngoba abalandeli bePirates bangaxoliswa nokuba yintoni ngoku emva kokubethwa kweqela labo kabini yiChiefs iiveki zilandelelana. 
Iqhuba kakuhle iPirates emdlalweni weDiski Challenge. Kanti yona iChiefs yagqibela ukuphumelela ngethuba ibetha iChippa United ngo’5-2.  
AmaBhakaniya aqhube kakuhle emdlalweni emva kokubetha iStellenbosch ngo’2-0 nokubambana neGolden Arrows ngo’1-1.  
UShaun Bartlett uza kuba nomsebenzi onzima njengomqeqeshi endaweni ka-Arthur Zwane oncedisa kwiqela lesizwe, xa ejongana nePirates emva kokuba iChiefs ibambene neBaroka FC ngo’1-1 neStellenbosch ngo’1-1. 
 Emva kwemidlalo, iBucs ihleli kwindawo yesine ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesine. Yona iChiefs ihleli kwindawo yesixhenxe ngeshumi elinethoba lamanqaku.  
Lo mdlalo omkhulu uza kutshayelelwa yimidlalo emibini ekulindeleke ibe nomtsalane nayo ebantwini. Emdlalweni wokuqala ngentsimbi yeshumi elinanye, AmaZulu aza kuswantsulisana neGolden Arrows.  
Kulandele idabi lasePitoli eliphakathi kweMamelodi Sundowns neSuperSport United ngentsimbi yokuqala eDobsonville Stadium. 
Mgqibelo: Baroka vs Polokwane City @Peter Mokaba Stadium; Highlands Park vs Bidvest Wits @Makhulong Stadium; Maritzburg United vs Bloemfontein Celtic @Harry Gwala Stadium. Cawe: Black Leopards vs Chippa United @Thohoyandou Stadium; Stellenbosch vs Cape Town City @Malta Park Sports Ground.

headline: Babize bonke, igalelekile iDStv Premier League!
text:
Igama lomxhasi omtsha wePremier Soccer League ebelilindwe ngamehlo abomvu lide labhengezwa.  
Kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo, ibhanki yakwa-Absa yagqiba kwelokuba ingasihlaziyi isivumelwano sayo sentsebenziswano nePSL emva kweminyaka elishumi elinesithandathu.  
Endaweni yayo, iPSL ibhengeze iDStv njengomxhasi wayo iminyaka emihlanu. Ukusukela ngoku kuza kutshila iDStv Premier Soccer League.  
Ukuchongwa kweDStv njengomxhasi omkhulu wePSL kwamkelwe ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo ngabantu. Bambi banexhala lokungavezwa kwemidlalo yiSABC kuba amalungelo okusasaza esezandleni zenkampani enye (DStv) nangona uGqqirha Irvin Khoza ethe izinto ziza kwenzeka njengesiqhelo.  
Okuhle ngeDStv kukuba iza nemali ebholeni ekhatywayo. Ibonakele lo nto ukusukela ngo2007, unyaka eyanikwa ngawo amalungelo okusasaza imidlalo yePSL. 
 Kwabakho ukufunquka kwemivuzo yabadlali kwanda nenani lemidlalo evela kumabonakude, kodwa okuncomeka kakhulu kukusungulwa kweMultiChoice Diski Challenge enika abadlali abasakhulayo ithuba lokuziqaqambisa phambi kokunyuselwa kwinqanaba eliphezulu ebholeni. 
Kukhangeleka ngathi iDStv ifike kanye kweyona ndawo ebibhalele kuyo. Ibonakele lo nto ngomhla ephehlelele ngayo indebe entsha xa isithi: “Babize bonke bazobona senzani”.  
UGqirha Khoza uthe intsebenziswano ephakathi kwePSL neDStv iza kufunqula ibhola yaseMzantsi Afrika noxa engangenanga nzulu kwicala leemali ebinze ngazo.  
“Sizimisele ukuyiphucula into esinika abantu siyiPSL sixhaswa nguDStv. Sikule nto sonke ngoba sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu bafumana imidlalo esemgangathweni ophezulu,” utshilo uGqirha Khoza.  
Yona ingqonyela kaMultiChoice, uCalvo Mawela, uthembise ngokwandisa imidlalo eza kubukelwa ngabantu, watsho esithi iDStv ifuna ukufikelela kuzo zonke iikona zoMzantsi Afrika. 
 “Nokuba ubukela umdlalo webhola okanye inkqubo yolonwabo, thina sisoloko sifuna ukuqinisekisa okokuba umsebenzi wethu uyamangalisa. Sifuna ibhola ekhatywayo ifikelele kuzo zonke iindawo. Njengokuba abantu beza kubukela imidlalo emininzi kunakuqala, sifuna wonke umntu awubange umdlalo webhola ekhatywayo,” utshilo uMawela.

headline: IiBulls zijongene nemfazwe eCanbera
text:
IiBulls zizakujongana nomceli mngeni ngomso xa zidlala neBrumbies kumdlalo wesibini kukhenketho lwazo. 
Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo abona badlali bazakwenza izinto zibenzima kwiiBulls nguDavid Pocock noScott Fardy abadlala kwiBrumbies. Esi sibini, ngabona badlali banamava abadlala ngaphambili, kwaye badlale indima ebonakalayo, ukusa iiWallabies kumdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi kwindebe yehlabathi yombhoxo kunyaka ophelileyo.  
Nangona iiBrumbies zinga- khange ziqhube kakuhle kwiveki ephelileyo xa bezidlala neHighlanders, uPocock ngomnye wabadlali abadlale ngokuzimisela kakhulu.  
Babini abadlali abaza- kubalithemba kwiiBulls, nguLappie Labuschagne, * -Arno Botha noHanro Liebenberg.  
Badlale kakuhle kakhulu kumdlalo weveki ephelileyo, kwaye ngowona mdlalo bahambe phambili kuwo kule sizini. 
Lo mdlalo uzakuxhomekeka kubadlali bamaqela omabini, kuba adlala umbhoxo ofanayo.

headline: UGordon uyakhala kakhulu ngoSangweni
text:
Owayeqeqesha iBafana Bafana, uGordon Igesund, uyakhala ngokwenzakala okutshabalalise ikamva likaSiyabonga Sangweni obeke phantsi ebholeni kwiveki ephelileyo ngenxa yokwenzakala obekumkhathaza kakhulu.  
Lo mdlali wanyanzelwa ngoogqirha beOrlando Pirates ukuba anikezele ngenxa yedolo ebelingaphili. U-Igesund osebenze noNsimbi kwiqela lesizwe ngethuba kudlalwa i2013 AFCON uxelele Isolezwe ukuba ukhathazekile yinto eyehlele uSangweni. 
 “USangweni ebengumdlali okumgangatho ophezulu, ebekungadluli nto kuye emva xa ekhona.  
Ebeyinkokeli engadingi ukunxiba ibhanti ukuze kubonakale ukuba ngukapteni. Ndalonwabela ixesha endasebenza naye ngalo. Bekungacaci ukuba ungumdlali wasemva, kuba ebelichule enyaweni.  
Nangoku amagowuli awawafaka sidlala neMorocco kwi-Afcon asesengqondweni yam.  
Ukonzakala kwakhe kusibulele ngoba siphoswe lithuba lokumbona engomnye wabadlali bomdlalo ophala phambili. Kulilishwa ukufika kwakhe sele ekhulile ngoba ebefanelwe kukudlala phesheya,” utshilo * -Igesund. 
Ngo2013 uSangweni wabayinxalenye yeqela lesizwe elafikelela kwimidlalo ephambi kowamagqibela kankqoyi we-Afcon. Ngo-2010, uNsimbi, wayekhona ngethuba uMzantsi Afrika udlalela indebe yehlabathi. Kanti kwiPirates udlale imidlalo yamagqibela kankqoyi yemidlalo yeCaf.  
Wayekhona ngo-2013 xa iBucs yayibethwa yiAl Ahl ngo’2-0 eYuphutha. Le ndedeba ibikwakhona xa iPirates ibethwa yi-Etoile du Sahel kumdlalo weCaf Confederation Cup.  
“Kuzothatha ixesha elide ukuze simbone umdlali onje- ngaye. Ebengumntu othuleyo, kodwa ethetha ngomsebenzi. Ndiyathemba akazulahleka ebholeni,” utshilo * -Igesund. 
USangweni uyeke ukudlala efumene inqwaba yeendebe kwiPirates. Ufumene iindebe zeNedbank ezimbini, i-Absa Premier Soccer League neTelkom Knockout. 
 Kwiqela lesizwe uSangweni udlale izihlandlo ezingamashumi amabini anethoba, wafaka amagowuli amane.

headline: UMzantsi Afrika uvuyisana noCaster Semenya
text:
Abantu boMzantsi Afrika abayivali imilomo emva kwempumelelo eshukumise lonke ihlabathi efunyenwe nguCaster Semenya ekuseni namhlanje eRio de Janeiro. 
Le ntokazi yaseLimpopo iphumelele imbasa yeGolide kwii-Olimpiki okokuqala kwezi zalo nyaka namhlanje.  
Akuphelelanga ngoba kwangaxeshanye, uCaster Semenya, ube ngumntu wasetyhini wokuqala omnyama ophumelele imbasa yeGolide kwii-Olimpiki ophuma kweli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika ezimbalini.  
Iqela lilonke ebelimele uMzantsi kwii-Olimpiki zika’2016 eRio libuye neshumi leembasa. Zimbini kuphela iiGolide – enye ize noSemenya lo. 
Kubekho ukuphucuka kwezi ii-Olimpiki ngoba ukwazile ukufumana eyona mbasa iphezulu – iGolide. Ngo’2012 eLondon, uCaster Semenya, wabuya nembasa yeSilivere.  
Abantu abaninzi kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo kwihlabathi kuquka neembaleki ezithile zivakalise ukungonwabi kwazo ngokukhuphisana noCaster ngenxa yemeko yobuni bakhe ezithi imnika amandla angaphezulu – kodwa yena ingqondo yakhe uyibeke kwiGolide le ebeyele yona eRio de Janeiro futhi wabuya nayo.  
USemenya uqinisekise ukuba izimvo zabantu abaneenjongo zokumtheza amandla akazihoyi ukusukela ekuqaleni ukuzothi ga ekugqibeleni.  
Yiyo lo nto ekwazile ukwenza imbali kweli loMzantsi Afrika ngokuthi afince umgama ongamakhulu asibhozo eemitha [800m] ngexesha elingumzuzu amashumu amahlanu nesihlanu emizuzwana [1:55.28].  
Sesona santya sakhe siphucukileyo ukusukela ngo’2009.  
“Umgama ongamakhulu amane wokuqala [400m] siwubaleke ngesantya esiphezulu kakhulu, wonke umntu ebetyhalela phambili. Umqeqeshi wam uthe kum kufuneka ndibenomonde futhi ndiphakamise ngakumbi kuphela xa kufanelekile.  
Kumnandi kakhulu ukubaleka neembaleki zehlabathi ezikwizinga eliphezulu,” utshilo uSemenya.

headline: USiyethemba Sithebe ufuna iChiefs iwawise AmaZulu kwiMTN8!
text:
Umdlali odlala esiswini kwiKaizer Chiefs, uSiyethemba Sithebe, ufuna ukubona iqela lakhe libetha AmaZulu emdlalweni ongempelaveki. Amakhosi adibana naMaZulu emdlalweni weMTN8 ekulindeleke ukuba utake iintlantsi eFNB Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu ngeCawe. Emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ogqithileyo akubangakho iqela eliphumelelayo. Kodwa izinto ziza kwahluka kwiMTN8 ngoba kulwelwa indebe. Ukuphumlela kweChiefs kungamchwayitisa kakhulu uSithebe emva kokuba AmaZulu engazange amvumele adlale phantse isiqingatha sonke sesizini egqithileyo emva kokuba ukuba uqhogiswe yiChiefs. Ethetha neentatheli izolo, uSithebe (29) uthe konke okwenzeka ekuSuthu wakuphosa kwelokulibala ngoku ingqondo yakhe ikwiChiefs. 
“Imeko endandikuyo yayinzima. Kodwa oko ndafika kwiChiefs izinto zabalula kakhulu ngoba ndamkelwa kakuhle,” utshilo uSithebe, olelinye lamaxhadi ka-Arthur Zwane esiswini kwisizini eqhubekayo. Emva kokungaqhubi kakuhle kweChiefs kwisizini egqithileyo, ithemba liye labekwa kubadlali abaninzi abathengiweyo. Akukho nto ebonakalayo abayenzileyo ukuzothi ga ngoku – kodwa uSithebe uthi izinto ziyahlangana nangona zihamba kancinci. “Umdlalo wethu uza kakuhle kwaye nendlela esidlala ngayo iya idibana. Into esingakwazanga ukuyenza kukufumana amagowuli kweminye imidlalo. 
“Liqela elikhulu iKaizer Chiefs kwaye ilandelwa ngabantu abaninzi. Kuba nzima ngenxa yoxinizelelo xa singaphumeleli imidlalo. Ukuze sothule umthwalo emagxeni wethu, kufuneka siphumelele imidlalo. Ukuba singaphumelela imidlalo emibini ilandelelana, izinto zingangcono ngoba kungakhula ukuzithemba kuthi singabadlali,” utshilo uSithebe. Uvumile kambe ukuba iya kuhlala isengqondweni into yokuba wayedlalela AmaZulu – kodwa uzimise ukunceda iqela lakhe ngoku liphumelele. “Oko xa ndisebaleni, ndisoloko ndizimisele ukwenza umsebenzi omhle. Sidlale ntanganye emdlalweni ogqithileyo nangona sasifuna ukuphumelela,” utshilo uSithebe.

headline: UMlandu unceda uluntu ngemidlalo
text:
Ixesha lokuphela konyaka ayiselilo eleziyunguma kuphela, abantu abaninzi balisebenzisa njengethuba lokuqokelela abantu ndawonye ukuze bafundiswe indlela yokuphila ngemidlalo baphinde baphetshiswe kwizinto ezimbi ezihamba nolonwabo kule mihla.  
Bekunjalo nakwiilali zaseLady Frere – apho bekukho itumente yebhola ekhatywayo kunye nomnyhadala wokuqokelela imali ekulindeleke ukuba uncedise abantu abangathathi-ntweni.  
Emva kokwakhel’ umkhanyo imeko yoluntu nokucinga okunzulileyo, uMnumzana uZuko Mlandu, ugqibe kwelokuba kubekho into ayenzela ulutsha lwendawo yakhe neendawo ezingqongileyo.  
Phambi kweNyibidyala, uMlandu uququzelele indibano yabantu abanefuthe eLady Frere naseMpuma Koloni ngokubanzi.  
Injongo ephambili ibikukuthetha noosomashishini ukuze bafake isandla kwiinkqubo zeelali zaseMalahleni Municipality. 
Iqhube kakuhle kakhulu loo ndibano ngokutsho kukaMlandu ngoba ukwazile ukufumana imali ephaya kumashumi amabini amawaka onke eerandi (R20 000) ekulindeleke incedise kakhulu kwiinkqubo zophuhliso lolutsha nokunceda abantu abasweleyo.  
Le ndibano ibizinyaswe ngabantu abafana noNkosi Ngangomhlaba Matanzima nosompempe obalaseleyo ebholeni ekhatywayo – uKhulasande Qongqo.  
Kwelinye icala kuye kwakho imidlalo emikhulu ekuquka iLady Frere Soccer Legends ebethe iHala No:2. Komnye umdlalo iXhalanga Blues ibethe iCacadu ngo’1-0.  
Nangona uMlandu ebeqala ukusingatha itumente ekumila kunje – kodwa ushiyeke onelisekile kakhulu emva kwayo.  
“Ndonelisekile kakhulu yinkqubela esiyenzileyo. Endingakuthetha mna kukuba ndonelisekile kakhulu yindlela esiqhube ngayo emsithweni nasemidlalweni yetumente. Sikulungele ngoku ukusingatha iitumente futhi sincede nabantu abangathathi-ntweni. Ndiyambulela umasipala waseMalahleni ngokusinika inkxaso,” utshilo uMlandu. 
Itumente kaMlandu kulindele ibenkulu kakhulu kwaye isetyenziswe njengeqonga lokuhluza abadlali abanezakhono zokudlala ibhola ekhatywayo kwinqanaba eliphezulu eMzantsi Afrika.

headline: Kufuneka sifunde kwiSundowns, utsho uMenzo
text:
Umqeqeshi we-Ajax Cape Town, uStanley Menzo, uvuya kakhulu njengokuba iqela lakhe libethe iMamelodi Sundowns izolo – kodwa uthi kufuneka lifunde indlela yokwenza izinto phaya kuyo.    Eli qela laseKapa liphumelele umdlalo walo wesibini izolo kule sizini ka’2016/17 emva kokubetha iDowns ngo’2-0 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obuseCape Town Stadium.  Amakhwenkwe kaMenzo azijulile kwakuko kwiintshatsheli ze-Afrika futhi khange abonakalise noluncinane uvalo emva kokuba zivuthulule iHighlands Park ngo’5-0 kwiveki ephelileyo.    UMenzo uthi ebesazi ukuba abadlali bakhe abaphazamisekanga emdlalweni – igowili ebelilindele lona, kwezeke njalo ngokwenene. “Ndiyazingca ke ngeli qela, mkhulu umsebenzi esiwenzileyo kwezi veki zimbalwa ezidlulileyo. Siphuma ebunzimeni,” utshilo uMenzo kwiSuperSport emva komdlalo izolo,”    Le ndedeba ithi ifuna i-Ajax ifunde kwiSundowns indlela yokudlala. “indlela esidlala ngayo isoloko ikwizinga eliphezulu kakhulu. Uzinzo eqeleni ulubona xa iqela lihlasela naxa lizikhusela. Jonga iSundowns xa idlala, inazo zonke ezo zinto. Kufuneka sifunde apha kwiSundowns, kufuneka siwuphuhlise umdlalo wethu. Kubalulekile ukwenyusa isantya somdlalo xa abadlali behlasela – kodwa bakwazi nokuyigcina kubo ibhola emdlalweni,” utshilo uMenzo.      
Umqeqeshi we-Ajax Cape Town, uStanley Menzo, uvuya kakhulu njengokuba iqela lakhe libethe iMamelodi Sundowns izolo – kodwa uthi kufuneka lifunde indlela yokwenza izinto phaya kuyo.

Le ndedeba ithi ifuna i-Ajax ifunde kwiSundowns indlela yokudlala. 
“indlela esidlala ngayo isoloko ikwizinga eliphezulu kakhulu. Uzinzo eqeleni ulubona xa iqela lihlasela naxa lizikhusela. Jonga iSundowns xa idlala, inazo zonke ezo zinto.
