headline: Phumla ngoxolo Phanini, Bhakaniya elimnyama!
text:
Siyisonga kakubi inyanga yoomama ngesithonga sokudlula emhlabeni kukaNokulunga Nopinki “Phanini” Nazo. Ngomhla weshumi kule nyanga yeThupha, sothuswe sisaziso esikhutshwe likhaya lakhe kwikhasi lakhe likaFacebook esithi uswelekile. Kwiintsuku ezintathu phambi koko, ebekhe wathi qatha engqondweni yam ngoba ebenqabile kuFacebook. Futhi ndazibuza ukuba kutheni wanqaba kodwa ndathi mhlawumbi uzixakekele njengamntu wonke ojongene nobomi obunzima eMzantsi Afrika kwezi ntsuku. Into ebibangela ndimcinge kukuba ikhona into awayendithembise ngayo kwinyanga ephelileyo. 
Ndambona ethegwe kwinto eyayibhalwe kuFacebook ngomntana omnyama, ofunda kwisikolo sabelungu eMonti, owayebalasele emdlalweni weHockey. Sasivene ke ukuba uza kundidibanisa nala mntana ukuze mna ndibhale ibhali ngaye kwiphepha labantu, I’solezwe lesiXhosa. Zange ndicinge ukuba namhlanje kwakube kusithiwa uNopinki akasekho emhlabeni. Anditsho kuba ndingazi ukuba ukufa yinto efika njengesela. Ndithe mandenze imiqolo embalwa ngoNopinki kuba ebeyitshomi wam. Ndadibna naye kuFacebook ndisasebenza eGoli phambi kokuqalwa kwephepha lesiXhosa ngo-2015. Yibhola into eyandisondeza kuye noxa ndandingamazi nokuba ngowaphi. 
UNopinki ebengumlandeli we-Orlando Pirates opheleleyo. Ebengapheleli ekuthetheni ngayo nokuncithana nabalandeli beKaizer Chiefs, ebehamba kooGoli, kooGqeberha –  naphi na apho kudlala iPirates. EbeliBhakaniya elinkone nozwane. Emva kwethutyana ndiqeshwe kwiphepha lesiXhosa (I’solezwe lesiXhosa), ndaye ndacela yena andazise kubalandeli bebhola eMpuma Koloni. Injongo yam yayikukwazi iphephandaba kubalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo. Wayenza lo nto uPhanini. Nguye owandazisa kubalandeli bePirates, iChiefs neSundowns endabakhupha ephepheni. Undincedisile emsebenzini wam kakhulu noxa yena wayengakuqondi ukubaluleka kwento awandenzela yona. 
Ebengalandeli ibhola ekhatywayo nje kuphela uPinklady, ebelandela neminye imidlalo. Ukugqibelana kwam naye, sasiyokwamkela AmaBhokobhoko kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya saseMonti emva kokuphumelela kwawo itumente yehlabathi ekupheleni kuka-2019. Wayehamba netshomi yakhe uZoliswa “Makhambule” Galo. Kwakumnandi kakhulu ngalo mini yembali ndade ndohlukana nabo. UNopinki ubekwe kwikhaya lakhe lokugqibela kwimpelaveki egqithileyo. Xa ndiphetha, ndifuna ukuthi kubi ukulahlekelwa komntu oluncedo eluntwini njengawe Phanini, umlandeli wezemidlalo obezimisele kakhulu. Kodwa ngoba ukufa yinto eyadalwayo, siyakwamkela ukuthathwa kwakho nguThixo. Uphumle ngoxolo ke Phanini, Bhakaniya elimnyama. Sohlala sikukhumbula kwezemidlalo.

headline: iMamelodi Sundowns ingcwabe iAl Merrikh emdlalweni weCAF Champions League!
text:
Iqela lebhola ekhatywayo lasePitoli, iMamelodi Sundowns, livale imidlalo kaGroup A lihleli phezulu emva kokuba lingcwabe iAl Merrikh namhlanje emalanga eGoli. Amasandawana ayivuthulule ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni (3-0) emdlalweni weCAF Champions League obumhle eFNB Stadium. Nangona iSundowns iye emdlalweni sele inayo indawo yayo kumjikelo olandelayo – kodwa iqale umdlalo ngokukhulu ukuzimisela. Abaqeqeshi bayo baqale umdlalo ngabadlali abafana noGeorge Maluleka noMosa Lebusa abanethuba elide bengasadlali ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukeneyo. Bekunyanzelekile iAl Merrikh ilwele ukufumana igowuli kuqala emdlalweni ukuze yandise amathuba wayo okuphumelela nokuya kwisigaba esilandelayo seCAF Champions League. 
Endaweni yoko, iSundowns ibhakuzelise umnatha kwangoko emdlalweni ngentloko kaMaluleka ofumene ibhola ebikhatywe ngobuchule nguAubrey Modiba ekoneni. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iSundowns ihamba phambili ngegowuli elinye eqandeni. Bebezama ukudlala abadlali beMerrikh – kodwa bonganyelwe zizitshovutshovu zasePitoli ezincwase ukuphumelela indebe yeChampions League okwesibini. Emva kweshumi elinesihlanu yemizuzu kwisigaba sesibini, uSurprise Ralani uphume phakathi kwamadoda wafaka igowuli lesibini leSundowns. 
Emva kwemizamo yeendwendwe yokufumana igowuli lokubika ekhaya, uKermit Erasmus, ongene kwisigaba sesibini, ufake igowuli elihle lesithathu emdlalweni. Ukubethwa kweMerrikh namhlanje kucuthe amathuba wayo okufumana iAl Ahly ekwindawo yesibini emva kweSundowns kuGroup A. Ukuqhuba kakuhle kwayo iSundowns emidlalweni yeChampions League kwandisa amathuba wayo okubuyisela ubunganga bayo ebholeni yezwekazi le-Afrika. Kanti nalapha eMzantsi Afrika, inamathuba amahle kakhulu okuphumelela iNedbank Cup nendebe yeDStv Premiership. Nangona kunjalo, kusafuneka yenze umsebenzi ebaleni.

headline: URigobert Song unethemba lokubetha iBrazil eyingozi
text:
Umqeqeshi weCameroon, uRigobert Song, unethemba lempumelelo emva kokudlala kakuhle kweqela lakhe emdlalweni ogqithileyo. ICameroon igxeleshe ukudlulela kwiTop 16 yetumente yehlabathi ebanjelwe eQatar emva kokubambana neSerbia ngo’3-3 eAl Janoub Stadium ngoLwesibini wale veki. Iqela likaSong lihlangulwe nguVincent Aboubakar ongene njengelalela kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Kunyanzelekile iCameroon iphumelele ngokucacileyo futhi ngamagowuli abalekayo ukuze iphephe izinto ezingayiphazamisa ngoba ikwindawo yesithathu kuGroup G okhokelwa yiBrazil eseyingene kwiTop 16 emva kokuphumelela imidlalo emibini. 
IBrazil ibethe iSerbia ngo’2-0 neSwitzerland ngo’1-0 ngokulandelelana. ISwitzerland, ekwindawo yesibini, yabetha iCameroon emdlalweni wokuqala phambi kokubethwa yiBrazil emdlalweni wesibini. Kufuneka iCameroon idlalele ukuthubeleza kwezo zinto ngoba iphethe umnqongo wenqaku emva kwemidlalo emibini. Akukho qela eliza kuchamza kwiBrazil ngoba iphakathi kwamaqela alushica kakhulu futhi ayingozi kakhulu – kodwa uSong ulithembile iqela lakhe emva kokuba libambene neSerbia ebikhokela ngo’3-1 emdlalweni ogqithileyo. “Singaya kwisigaba elindelayo. Asizanga apha (eQatar) uzokongeza nje inani lamazwe azokudla. Iskhona iCameroon kwitumente yehlabathi,” utshilo uSong. 
Ukuzithemba kukaSong akothusi emva kokuqhub kakuhle kweCameroon. Okubi kukuba iqela lakhe liphazanyiswe kukupheqa kukanozinti olithemba lakhe. USong umguzule uAndre Onana emva kokungquzulana naye ngamazwi. “Ungumdlali obalulekileyo u-Onana – kodwa ke kufuneka kubekwe phambili iqela ngaphezulu kweziqu,” utshilo uSong. Akukacaci nokuba umba ka-Onana uya kusonjululwa na phambi komdlalo obalulekileyo weCameroon kwitumente yehlabathi. Akukabikho mdlalo ewuphumeleleyo iCameroon kwemibini eyidlalileyo. Ibethiwe yiSwitzerland yadlala ntanganye komnye. Kufuneka iphumelele – kodwa kwakuxhomekeka ukuba iSerbia neSwitzerland zidlale njani.

headline: ‘Ndiza kuwuphumelela umlo ngoMgqibelo’
text:
Uqinisekile ukuba kuza kuphakama esakhe isandla emva komlo uYanga Sigqibo. 
 OkaSigqibo uza kukhusela intshinga yakhe yeWBO Intercontinental xa edibana noJoseph Ambo wasePhilipines emlweni wetumente yokubhiyozela ubomi bongasekhoyo uTat’uRholihlahla Mandela ngempelaveki.  
“Ndimbukele kakhulu kuYoutube. Akayiyo imbethimanqindi esebenzisa amandla kakhulu. Ndiqinisekile ukuba ndiza kuwuphumelela umlo ngoMgqibelo,” utshilo uSigqibo ocele abalandeli okokuba bayokubukela amanqindi ngempelaveki. 
Omnye umlo ophambili kwitumente yangoMgqibelo eququzelelwa yiXaba Promotions neZbashy Promotions, uphakathi kukaGideon Buthelezi noAdrien Jemenez waseMexico abaza kube bejijisana ngentshinga yeIBO esichengeni.  
UNkosinathi Joyi uza kuvavanyana noSiphamandla Baleni emlweni weWBO Global, kudidi lweJunior Fly.  
UJackson Chauke uza kukhusela intshinga yakhe yoMzantsi Afrika yodidi lweMpukane kuSihle Jelwana.  
Yonke imijikelo yemilo ilishumi elinambini. Kodwa itumente eza kube iseInternational Convention Centre iza kuquka neminye imilo emibini. Imilo iza kuqala ngentsimbi yesixhenxe ngokuhlwa. 
NgeCawe iRumble Africa Promotions iza neyayo ingxikela yamanqindi ngentsimbi yesibini eOrient Theatre.  
Kumlo ophambili uLudumo Lamati uza kujijisana ngentshinga yeIBF Intercontinental noRichie Callunsay Mepranum waseMexico.  
UXolisa Magusha uza kukhusela intshinga yakhe yoMzantsi Afrika yodidi lwengcongolo kuSiyakholwa Khuse.  
Umlo oza kohlula abalandeli baseMonti kubini, uphakathi kukaSive Nontshinga waseBiko Village noSiyabonga Siyo waseZiphunzane.  
Omabini la magatyana aza kukruthakruthana ngentshinga yeIBF Intercontinental kudidi lweJunior flyweight.  
Yonke le milo iza kuthatha imijikelo elishumi elinambini. Kwimilo yentshinga yeABU, uLuyanda Ntwanambi ungquzulana noFikile Mlonyeni.  
Ngelixa uMicheal Mokoena evavanyana noPhumelele Sobahle emlweni oza kuba nemijikelo elishumi.

headline: ULeonardo Castro useza kuhlala eminye iminyaka eNaturena!
text:
Ifolosi yaseColombia, uLeonardo Castro, iseza kuhlala eminye iminyaka eNaturena emva kokuba etyikitye isivumelwano sengqesho esitsha namhlanje. Amakhosi akhuphe isibhengezo kumakhasi onxibelelwano esithi uCastro uza kuhlala iminyaka emibini kwiKaizer Chiefs. Isigqibo sikaCastro silandela iingxelo ebezisithi kunokwenzeka ayifulathele iChiefs. Namhlanje angcwatyiwe amaqashiso ngaye kwaye zithe xibilili izibilini kubalandeli beChiefs. “SiyiChiefs noLeonardo Castro sivumelene ngokwandisa isivumelwano sakhe sengqesho ngeminye iminyaka emibini. Lo nto ithi uza kuhlala kude ibe ngunyaka ka-2022,” itshilo ingxelo ekutshwe yiChiefs kwikhasi lomnathi – uFacebook. 
UCastro,31, ngomnye wabadlali axhathise ngabo u-Ernst Middendorp kwiChiefs nangona ekhe akamsebenzisa kwisizini egqithileyo. Lo nto iye yabangela kwakho iingxelo ezithi uCastro ufuna ukubuyela kwiMamelodi Sundowns – apho wayesuka khona. “Ndiyabulela kakhulu kuwe Mnu. Kaizer Motaung nakwiqela lonke. Ndiyavuya njengokuba ndiseza kunxiba isikipha esimnyama nagolide. Yinto ebalulekileyo kum leyo ngoba akukabikho ndebe endiyifumeneyo kweli qela. Ukuhamba ndingayivumenanga ibiza kuba yinto embi kakhulu kum. Ndinqwenela ukuzuza indebe kweli qela. Kodwa ndiqinisekile, iqela esinalo ngoku linawo amandla okuyenza lo nto,” utshilo uCastro. 
Amakhosi aneminyaka emihlanu egcweleyo kungasangeni ndebe eNaturena. Ukufika kwabadlali abasemgangathweni ophezulu njengoLeonardo Castro noKhama Billiat kwakubonwa njengento eyakugweba indlala – kodwa kusenzima nangoku. Likhona kekambe ithemba kule isizini ngoba iChiefs yiyo ehleli phezulu kwiPSL. “Ndiyakuvuyela ukuhlala apha eMzantsi Afrika kwaye nentsapho yam usamkele isigqibo endisenzileyo,” uvale ngalo mazwi uCastro. Ukuhlala kukaCastro kuziindaba ezimnandi ngoba iChiefs yile ingavumelekanga ukuthenga abadlali emva kokugwetywa yiFifa ngenxa yokutyikitya umdlali waseMadagascar ngendlela engahambisani nomthetho wayo ngokugcweleyo.

headline: UPitso uxhalabile kukonzakala kwabadlali
text:
IMamelodi Sundowns igalelekile kweli loMzantsi Afrika izolo emva kohambo lwaseKinshasa, apho ibethwe khona yi-AS Vita, ngegowuli elinye eqandeni kumdlalo womlenze wokuqala weCAF Champions League. 
ISundowns inikezele ngomzuzu wokugqibela kulo mdlalo, yavumela i-AS Vita ukuba ifake igowuli nekwazileyo ukuphumelela umdlalo ngalo. Iqela likaPitso Mosimane liza- kwenyuka iqhina xa lidlala, ne-AS Vita kumdlalo womlenze wesibini kwiveki ezayo, ePitoli.  
Ukuxakeka kweMamelodi Sundowns kwezi veki zimbini zizayo kuzakuchaphazela indlela elizakuqhuba ngayo iqela likaMosimane, kwaye naye imenzela ixhala loo nto. 
Ngomso iSundowns, ehleli kwindawo yokuqala kwiPremier Soccer League izakube ijamelene nePolokwane City e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium, kumdlalo wePSL ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesixhenxe ngokuhlwa. Emva kwalo mdlalo phakathi kweSundowns neRise and Shine, ngoMgqibelo iSundowns iza- kwamkela iJomo Cosmos ehleli kwindawo yesibini ukusuka ekugqibeleni kwiPSL.  
Lo umdlalo uzakudlalelwa eLucas Moripe Stadium ngokuhlwa ngoMgqibelo. Ayiphelelanga apho kuba ngoLwesibini iSundowns izakungquzulana ne-AS Vita kumdlalo womlenze wesibini bakugqiba balungiselele i-Orlando Pirates, kumdlalo weNedbank kulo Mgqibelo uzayo. 
Ixhala likaMosimane kukuba ukutshintshwa tshintshwa kweqela kungachaphazela indlela abadlala ngayo abadlali bakhe. 
“Ngokwalo mzuzu imeko ayikhontle kuba sinabadlali abambalwa abenzakeleyo, kodwa sinethemba lokuba singabuyisa abadlali abathile kweminye imidlalo,”utshilo uMosimane.

headline: UHejana uphumelele iBonkolo Marathon
text:
Imbaleki yodumo yaseMonti, uLuthandao Hejana, uphumelele isihlandlo sesithathu umdyarho weembaleki ozikhilomitha ezingamashumi amane anesibini iBonkolo Marathon.  
Ngamava akhe uHejana, uphumelele lo mdyarho eshiya iimbaleki eziphuma kwiReal Gijimas neQueenstown Harriers. Kunyaka ophelileyo uHejana uphumelele lo mdyarho ngenxa yokusebenza nzima kwintsuku ezandulela umdyarho elungiselela ukuphumelela.  
“Akukho nto intsha ndiyenzileyo nakulo unyaka ndisebenze nzima kuba ndifuna ukuphumelela, kubalulekile ukuba umntu aziphathe kakuhle, azilolonge aphinde atye ngokufanelekileyo,” utshilo uHejana. 
Imozulu epholileyo yenze ukuba uHejana ayibone ngaphandle kwengxaki impumelelo.  
“Ndithe xa ndifika kumgama wamashumi amabini ekhilomitha ndeva ukuba ndivukelwa yimikhinkqi, ngenxa yamava ndikwazile ukulwa nayo longxaki nemozulu nayo isincedisile ukuba sibaleke ngempumelelo,” utshilo. 
Le mbaleki yeBorn 2 Run ivela kuzinganga kwimidyarho efana neTwo Oceans Marathon yaseKapa, Legends neHeros Marathon.  
“Ukubaleka ndiqale ngonyaka ka-2006 ndiqala kwimiganyana emifutshane ndakhula ngenxa yokuba ndiyakuthanda ukubaleka oku,” utshilo uHejaba.  
Ziimbaleki ezingamakhulu asixhenxe ezithe zathatha inxaxheba kulo mdyarho, ziphuma kwimibutho eyahlukeneyo eMzantsi Afrika.  
Inenekazi laseMonti, uXoliswa Bici, nguye ophume phambili kwicala lamanenekazi.  
Ingxelo kaFerreira ithi lomdyarho waqala ngomhla wesine kwinyanga kaNovemba ngonyaka ka-1977 unembaleki ezingamashumi amahlanu anesithathu kuphela. Inkampani ezahlukileyo zithe zaxhasa lo mdyarho ngeendlela ezahlukileyo njengesiqhelo.  
“Abaxhasi bethu abaphambili yinkampani yakwa Twizzer kwaye siyababulela ngenkxaso yabo, nabanye abasixhasileyo ukwenza lo msebenzi ube yimpumelelo,” utshilo uFerreira.

headline: UJames Okwuosa ubuyele kwiChippa
text:
UJames Okwuosa ubuyele kwiiChilli-boys kwakhona. Lo mdlali uneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu udlale indima ebalulekileyo kwinkqubela eyenziwe leli qela laseMpuma Koloni kwisizini edlulileyo – kodwa kuthe xa kuphela isizini kwavakala iindaba ezithi uthathwe yi-Orlando Pirates, ezondaba zangqinwa nayiChippa.  
NgoLwesithathu uthe gqi kwiChippa United kwakhona lo mdlali emva kokuba iPirates ingamtyikityanga. Ngoku unikwe iminyaka emine ziiChilli-boys. Eli qela lizinze eBhayi livale isizini ka’2015/16 lihleli kwindawo yesithandathu. Ngoku lilungiselela ukudlala okokuqala kwiMTN 8 xa kuvulwa isizini ka’2016/17.  
Amalungiselelo weChippa aqale kule veki ngokuthi ibhengeze ngokusesikweni abadlali abatsha phambi kweyona sizini ekulindeleke ukuba inike umdlalo ongumangaliso.  
Nanga amagama wabo: Sherwin Bailey; Bulumko Ceki; Xolani Mdaki; Vusumzi Mncube; Sizwe Mdlinzo; Strydom Wambi; Paseka Maku; Phetolo Sekome; Tshwarelo Bereng; Siphesihle Stuurman; Bongani Ndudula; Kristopher Bergman; Zama Dlamini; Veli Mothwa; Menzi Masuku. Kukho abadlali abahambileyo kweli qela abafana noNkosinathi Mthiyane no-Eric Chipeta – lo nto iye yalinyanzela liqinise phaya naphaya.  
“Sonelisekile kakhulu ngumgangatho wabadlali esibafumeneyo phambi kwesizini entsha.  
“Ndiyabulela kumnumzana uSiviwe Mpengesi nabaphathi bebonke. Ndisebenzile ngaphambili nabadlali abaninzi kwaba bafikayo, andithandabuzi – kuninzi abazakuthi basenzele kona,” utshilo umqeqeshi uDan Malesela. 
Njengokuba iChippa iqhube kakuhle kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League kwisizini edlulileyo, ngoku kulindwelwe lukhulu kuyo. “Asikwazi ukulala emqokozweni. Kufuneka sisebenze ngokuzimisela kwakhona ukuze sonwabise abalandeli bethu,” utshilo uMalesela. 
Usihlalo weli qela, uSiviwe Mpengesi, uthi ufuna lithathe apho beliyeke khona kwisizini ephelileyo.  
Kuphehlelwe umxholo omtsha othi: #SeasonOfGrowth othetha ukuthi le izayo yisizini yokukhula kweChippa. “Kuninzi esikwenzileyo ngelizama ukuqinisekisa ukuba yonke into ihamba kakuhle.  
“Ndibathembile abantu esinabo futhi ndinethemba lokuba bakuyithatha iChippa bayinyusele phezulu,” utshilo uMpengesi.

headline: IStormers iyazibonakalisa kwiSuper Rugby
text:
Le mpelaveki iphelileyo ibiyeyona inika umdla kwiSuper Rugby, ingakumbi kumaqela alapha eMzantsi Afrika. IStormers siqhube kakuhle kakhulu ePerth ngoMgqibelo kwaye impumelelo yaso ithetha ukuthi eli qela laseNtshona Koloni liphumelele inkomfa yokuqala yamaqela ase-Afrika. 
Khange uqale kakuhle umdlalo phakathi kweStormers neForce kuba emva kwemizuzu engamashumi amathathu anesixhenxe, la maqela ebebambene ngamanqaku amathathu. Ukungqengqa ekalikeni kabini kwabadlali beStormers kulincede kakhulu eli qela, lahamba phambili ngamanqaku phambi kokuba kuyiwe ekhefini. 
Kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba lisebenze nzima eli qela ukuze lifumane inqaku lebhonasi, sele kushiyeke imizuzu engamashumi amabini anesibini. Imeko yemoyezulu inyanzelise iStormers ukuba sitshintshe indlela yokudlala. Abadlali bangemva uJean-Luc du Plessis noNic Groom benze kakuhle ngamanqina abo. 
ILions nesabambe indawo yayo ephezulu kumaqela eSuper Rugby kufuneka iqinisekise ukuba ibuya nayo onke amanqaku kumdlalo wayo olandelayo, nowokugqibela kwiSuper Rugby xa izakube idlala neJaguares kuMgqibelo esiya kuwo. 
Kwiveki ephelileyo bekukho amarhe okuba eli qela laseRhawutini lingasebenzisa abadlalali abangomelelanga kakhulu. Ukuthelekiswa namaqela afane neSouthern Kings neJaguares kwimidlalo yokugqibela kube ngamanqaku ebhonasi awodwa kwiiLions. 
Into ebalulekileyo ngoku kukuba abadlali ingabangeni entloko into yokuhlala phezulu, kuba umsebenzi awukagqitywa. 
Elinye lamaqela azakuma endleleni yeeLions, yiWellington Hurricanes yaseNew Zealand. Izolo eli qela lizibekele indawo kwimidlalo eyandulela amagqibela kankqoyi yeSuper Rugby.

headline: UVabaza ulangazelela iwonga elikhulu emanqindini
text:
Usompempe waseMonti olinenekazi ophume izandla ufuna iwonga elibalulekileyo ekuthiwa yiLifetime Achievement. Lo sompempe nguSiya Vabaza-Booi, ongomnye wabantu abaphume bencumile eholweni ebekubanjelwe kulo umsitho wokuwonga abagqwesileyo emanqindini eSandton, eGoli.  
UVabaza-Booi uthiwe jize ngewonga lokuba ngoyena sompempe obalaseleyo kumanenekazi kunyaka ka2018. Ngoku uVabaza-Booi uthi ufuna iwonga elikhulu – iLifetime Achievement.  
“Kudala ndisemanqindini. Ngunyaka wam wamashumi amathathu ndisebenza lo msebenzi. Eli lithuba lokuba ndidedele ulutsha. Iwonga endilifumeneyo ibilelesixhenxe. Kudala noko ndiwaphumelela. Ndifuna elona wonga likhulu ngoku,” utshilo uVabaza-Booi. 
UVabaza-Booi uncome uBoxing SA noRhulumente olawulayo ngokunika ithuba amanenekazi ukuze abanegalelo emanqindini.  
“Ekuqaleni yayindim ndedwa inenekazi elingusompempe. Ndiyabulela kuRhulumente noBSA ngokuqinisekisa ukuba amanenekazi anikwa ithuba emdlalweni wamanqindi,” utshilo.  
Emva kokuphumelela, uVabaza-Booi ubulele indima eyenziwe lusapho lwakhe, abaququzeleli nabalandeli bamanqindi.  
“Ndibulela wonke umntu ondixhasileyo kuhambo lwam emanqindi,” utshilo.  
Kwelinye icala, imbethimanqindi yaseMdantsane, uThulani Mbenge, igoduke newonga lembethimanqindi ebalaseleyo. Ngelixa intshatsheli yoMzantsi Afrika emanenekazini kudidi lweNtambanani, uMellisa Miller, igoduke newonga lembethimanqindi elinenekazi elibalaseleyo kunyaka ka2018. 
Amanye amawonga: 
Male fight of the year: Mzoxolo Ndwayana v Shaun Ness 
Female fight of the year: Asandiswa Nxokwana v Sherodine Fortuin 
Male prospect of the year: Ayabonga Sonjica 
Female prospect of the year: Simangele Hadebe 
Media person of the year: Thabiso Mosia 
Male ring official of the year: Alan Matakane 
Most promising ring official of the year: Simphiwe Gceba 
Knockout of the year: Zolani Tete v Siboniso Gonya 
Trainer of the Year: Colin Nathan 
Promoter of the year: Teris Ntutu (Rumble Africa Promotions) 
Most promising promoter of the year: Xolani Mampunye of Last-Born Promotions 
Manager of the year: Colleen McAusland 
Special achievements: Zolani Tete, Hekkie Budler, Moruti Mthalane, Xaba Boxing Promotions 
Lifetime achievement awards: Themba Zulu, Les Andreasen, Gladys Tsenene, Jeff Ellis, Mzoli Madyaka. 
isibhalo@inl.co.za

headline: Coetzee: Ngumsebenzi onzima ukuqeqesha iSpringboks
text:
Inzalelwane yaseRhini, uAllister Coetzee, ibhengezwe njengomqeqeshi oyintloko weSpringboks isithuba seminyaka emine.  
Esi sibhengezo senziwe ngumongameli weSARU, * -Oregan Hoskins, izolo apho athe ukuqeshwa kukaCoetzee kubonakalisa isiqalo esitsha kumbhoxo waseMzantsi Afrika. 
UCoetzee (52) wayengumncedisi mqeqeshi weSpringbok ngonyaka ka-2000, waphinda wancedisa uJake White ukusuka kunyaka ka-2004 ukuya ku-2007. Lo kaCoetzee ufika kwiSpringbok ngexesha apho abadlali abaninzi ababengamaqhawe kwindebe yehlabathi ka-2007 sele beyekile ukudlala umbhoxo.“Ukuqeshwa kukaCoetzee kuthetha isiqalo esitsha kumbhoxo waseMzantsi Afrika kwinqanaba eliphezulu, kwaye kubonakalisa ukuba uyakude umbhoxo kweli lizwe,” utshilo uHoskins 
.“U-Allister nguye oye wankqenkqeza phambili kubagqatswa kwesi sikhundla xa sijonga imbali yakhe embhoxweni. Uwuqonda kakhuhle umbono wethu ongenguqu ngokwebala embhoxweni, kunye nomfanekiso azakube ewumele njengomqeqeshi weSpingbok.  
Ndiyavuya ukumamkela kwakhona kwigqiza leSpringboks.” Impumelelo kaCoetzee kwinqanaba leSuper Rugby nakwiCurrie Cup imbeka phambili njengomnye wabaqeqeshi abanamava abakhe baqeqesha iSpringboks. Uthathe inxaxheba kwimidlalo engamashumi amathandathu anesithandathu yeSpringbok, ubengumqeqeshi weStormers ukusuka kunyaka ka2010 ukuza kutsho kunyaka ophelileyo. Uchithe isizini elisekela mqeqeshi kwiiSharks nakwi-EP Kings. UCoetzee uthi, liwonga kuye ukuqeqesha iSpringboks. 
“Lo msebenzi uzanoxanduva olukhulu kuba abalandeli bobhoxo abazingcayo basoloko befuna impumelelo kwiSpringbok ngalo lonke ixesha,” utshilo uCoetzee. 
“Umbhoxo uthandwa kakhulu kwilizwe loMzantsi Afrika.” 
Umphathi wezemidlalo uFikile Mbalula uvuyisene noCoetzee ngelithi kufuneka aqhubekeke nomgomo weSpringbok wokuphumelela imidlalo neetumente.

headline: UGimenez uzishiye zityumkile iintliziyo zamaYiphutha
text:
UMohammed Salah uthokombise intloko kubonakala ukuba uxhelekile entliziyweni yakhe emva kokufakwa kwegowuli kwimizuzu yokugqibela emdlalweni. Inyaniso mayithethwe – AmaYiphutha ebexhathisile futhi abadlali bayo i-Uruguay bebexakiwe kwade kwakwimizuzu yokugqibela kwisigaba sesibini – ngethuba uJose Maria Gimenez efaka igowuli elihle ngentloko kumdlalo obunzima kakhulu wesibini weFIFA World Cup kwibala ekuthiwa yi-Ekaterinburg Stadium. Lelo gowuli linye elenze idemeshe kumsebenzi omhle owenziwe yi-Egypt phantse umdlalo wonke – kwaye ikwa lilo elishiye iintliziyo zenkitha zamaYiphutha zichontsiza igazi. 
 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla amazwe omabini ebambene noxa i-Uruguay ibiyeyona inamandla. Iifolosi ezimbini zase-Uruguay ezoyikwayo uSuarez noCavani uphele umdlalo bengacholanga naphantsi – kodwa akukho bani onokubatyola ngokungazami. Zikhona iibhola iibhola ezimbi abazidlalileyo – ntekunayo bebefika unozinti u-Elshenewy uvale kwanto eza kuye. Isigaba sesibini besithatnde ukubanochatha ngoba iqela ngalinye belifuna igowuli lempumelelo. Uruguay yiyo ekwazileyo ukudala amathuba acacileyo kune-Egypt. Lo nto ithethe ukuthi ukungabikho kukaMohammed Salah, odume ngkufaka amagowuli, bekuvakala ngoba ebengekho umntu wokugqibezela iibhola ezitywe emacaleni. 
 
Emva kwempumelelo yayo i-Uruguay namhlanje, lo nto ithetha ukuthi ibambene neRussia ngamanqaku amathathu noxa abasingathi bendebe yehlabathi benamagowuli amaninzi emva kokuvuthulula iSaudi Arabia ngemvula yamagowuli amahlanu izolo kumdlalo wokuqala kaGroup A. Kwakunyanzeleka ukuba nayo iYuphutha izingombele iSaud Arabia ukuze ibenokufumana ithuba lokuya kumjikelo olandelayo. 
 
Uruguay: Muslera, Varela, Giménez, Godin, Cáceres, Bentancur, Vecino, Nandez, De Arrascaeta, Cavani, Suárez. 
Egypt: Elshenewy; Fathi, Gabr, Hegazi, Abdel Shafi; Hamed, Elneny; Trezeguet, Said, Warda; Mohsen

headline: UMashaba akayoyiki i-Angola
text:
Umqeqeshi weqela lesizwe iBafana Bafana, uShakes Mashaba, uzakuqala umsebenzi onzima kakhulu, ngowona ubalulekileyo kumqashi wakhe nakwilizwe ngokubanzi , lo wokudlala kwitumente yehlabathi. Okoko wamkwelwa ngo-1992 uMzantsi Afrika kwimidlalo yehlabathi, ilizwe loMzantsi Afrika lidlale kwitumente yeFIFA izihlandlo ezithathu. 
 Umsebenzi wokuzibekela indawo kwiFIFA World Cup ngumba ophambili kwiSAFA kwaye lo nto yenye yezinto uShakes ekufuneka ezenzile ngakumbi emva kokuba abantu beli bebukele iFIFA World Cup eBrazil kunyaka ophelileyo ngaphandle kwelizwe labo. 
Kodwa nangona kunjalo, uShakes Mashaba, uthi akoyiki ngokoyikiswa kwaye uzakuqokelela iqela elomeleleyo. ABafana Bafana bathelekiswe nelizwe lalapha ebumelwaneni, i-Angola, kwimidlalo yokuzibekela indawo kwi-2018 World Cup ezakusingathwa yiRussia.  
“Ndonwabile kakhulu ngamazwe esizokuqubisana nawo. Andiqondi ukuba ikhona into endinokuyifuna ngaphezulu kwale siyifumeneyo apha namhlanje”utshilo uMashaba. 
“Sidlalile ne-Angola amatyeli aliqela, nangona kwabakho ukubambana phaya naphaya kodwa sithi abathe kratya kunabo kwicala leziphumo. Ndiqiniseke ngento enye, eyokuba sizakuzilungiselela ngokupheleleyo phambi kwalo mdlalo kodwa asingekhe siyithathele phantsi tu i-Angola” wongeze ngalo mazwi uMashaba 
Umdlalo wokuqala phakathi kwala mazwe mabini uzakuba kwisithuba seenyanga ezimbini ezizayo e-Angola, emva kweeveki ezimbini , kuzakudlalelwa umlenze wesibini kweli loMzantsi Afrika.  
Amazwe aphume phambili kumjikelo wesibini kuzakukhethwa kuwo amazwe amahlanu azakuthi amele ilizwekazi le-Afrika kwi-2018 FIFA World Cup.  
Le yimidlalo ekufuneka uShakes Mashaba  ayiphathe ngobunono kwaye aqinisekise ukuba aBafana Bafana bayaya eRussia ngapha koko angabonwa njengomnye wabaqeqeshi abangenzanga mahluko kweli qela emva kokuba litshintshe abaqeqeshi amatyeli aliqela ukusukela ngo’2010.

headline: Amakhosi adlulele kolandelayo weNedbank Cup
text:
Amakhosi adlulele kumjikelo olandelayo weNedbank Cup emva kokubetha iStellenbosch FC ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni kumdlalo obubanjelwe e-Athlone Stadium kobu busuku banamhlanje. Nangoma iKaizer Chiefs iliqela elikhulu ekusoloko kulindeleke ukuba iwongamele amaqela adlala kumgangatho osezantsi – kodwa bekukho ithemba lokuba iStellenbosch ingagoloza eKapa.  
Amagowuli wempumelelo, kulo mdlalo obuzinyaswe ngabalandeli beChiefs abaliqela, afakwe nguJoseph Molangoane, uSiphiwe Tshabalala noGustavo Paez – onke angene kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Umdlali othe waqaqamba ibenguLuck Baloyi – obeyibambe esiswini noWillard Katsande. Umdlalo uqale ngezinga eliphantsi, ilelo nelo iqela kubonakala ukuba alifuni kulahlekelwa ngumdlalo. IChiefs yiyo ebisebholeni ubukhulu becala – kodwa abadlali beStellenbosch baye baqinisekisa ukuba bayavala onke amazibuko ukuze ingacholi naphantsi. Omabini la maqela akakwazanga ukudala amathuba acacileyo kwisiqingatha sokuqala – lo nto iwanyanzele ukuba aye kwixesha lokuphumla iyinkwa nenkwa [0-0]. 
 
  
 
Amakhosi abuye elume ongezantsi kwesesibini isiqingatha somdlalo. Kwimizuzu embalwa siqalile, uMolangoane ungqube ngentloko yahlala emnatheni ibhola egotywe ngobuchule obungumangaliso nguGustavo Paez. Emva koko uTshabalala utsale intambula ekude angakwazanga ukuyibamba uWashington Arubi. USteve Komphela ufake uWilliam Twala noGeorge Lebese abafike benza umahluko emdlalweni. NguLebese obenegalelo kwigowuli lokugqibela elifakwe nguPaez – obeqala ukufaka igowuli njengomdlali weChiefs ukusukela ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka. Abadlali beStellenbosch badlale kakuhle kulo mdlalo, into abangakwazanga ukuyenza kakuhle kukuhlasela iChiefs kakuhle kwisigaba sokuqala nakwesi sesibini isiqingatha. 
Komnye umdlalo i-Ajax Cape Town itshonelwe lilanga emini namhlanje ngethuba ibethwa yiKwaDukuza ngo’4-3 kumapenela kumdlalo obuseSugar Ray Xulu Stadium. IKwaDukuza izingomba isifuba emva kokubambana ne-Ajax ngo’2-2 emdlalweni. IBloemfontein Celtic izibethele iBuya Msuthu ngo’2-0 kumdlalo weNedbank Cup, eMoruleng Stadium, emalanga namhlanje. Nayo iBaroka FC idlulele kumjikelo olandelayo emva kokubetha iFC Cape Town ngo’2-0 kumdlalo obuseNNK Rugby Stadium. IJomo Cosmos ibethe i-United Rovers ngo’3-0 eTsakane Stadium. Yona iFree State Stars ingombe iHighlands Park ngo’2-0 eGoble Park Stadium. 
  
Stellenbosch FC: 36. Arubi, 20. Skippers, 34. Sait, 2. Rowell, 21. Brown, 26. Mekoa, 8. Webber, 11. Mabua, 6. Moroole, 10. Mushond, 37. Dube. 
  
Kaizer Chiefs: 16. Khuzwayo, 18. Moleko, 3. Mathoho, 4. Cardoso, 13. Khumalo, 31. Katsande, 35. Baloyi, 23. Molangoane, 11. Chirambadare, 14. Tshabalala, 28. Paez.

headline: UKomani ufuna itayitile yoMzantsi Afrika
text:
Umasipala waseMbhashe ungxamele ukuzibonakalisa kwicala lokusingatha imisitho yezemidlalo.  
KuMgqqibelo ogqithileyo, idolophu yaseDutywa ifumene inyhweba enqabileyo yokusingatha itumente yamanqindi ebiququzelelwe nguMnu. Ntsikayezwe Sigcawu noMbhashe Municipality kwiholo loluntu – apho iimbethimanqindi zaseMpuma Koloni naseNtshona Koloni ziswantsulisene kwanzima. 
 Kumlo ophambili, uDalisile Komani ubuyele eKhayelitsha (eNtshona Koloni) eyintshatsheli evunyiweyo emva kokubetha ngamanqaku uMbulelo Nxazonke ozamileyo ukuxhathisa kwade kwangumzuzu wokugqibela. 
UKomani, 36, wazalelwa eQonce – kodwa ngoku uhlala eNtshona Koloni ngenxa yemeko eyamnyanzelayo ukuba ayokukhangela amadlelo aluhlaza.  
OkaKomani uzingombe isifuba emva kokuphumelela ekuye kwacaca gca ukuba impumelelo ayifumene eMpuma Koloni yinto ebaluleke kakhulu kuye. 
 UKomani uye eDutywa ezilungiselele; futhi elungiselele nezinto ezinokuthi zimehlele. Kube njalo ngethuba kusithiwa umlo wakhe noNxazonke mawungene pambi kwexesha lawo ngenxa yengxaki yezibane eholweni. 
 Nakubeni kunjalo, uKomani uzamkele iziphumo.  
“Umlo ubumhle kakhulu. Bendingamazi lo mfana wakwaNxazonke. Ndimane ndisiva nje ngaye – kodwa ke umqeqeshi wam uzamile usibonisa indlela abantu baseMonti abalwa ngayo. Size apha sizixelele ukuba siza kudlala amanqindi ngendlela esiyaziyo,” utshilo uKomani. 
Nakubeni imbethimanqindi yaseQonce izuze impumelelo emva kokusokola kumlo obunzima kakhulu – kodwa iye yaphalaza imbilini yayo ngento engayithandanga eyenzekileyo.  
“Abantu baseMonti behleli nje bafuna ukuqubula ukuze babonakale ngathi baphezulu. Nangoku bekumeluba ndilwe ekugqibeleni – kodwa kuthiwe mandilwe ndingazishushubeza phambi komdlalo. Umqeqeshi wam uthi kuseMonti apha, masiyolwa. Andiyithandanga into yokulwa ndingafumananga nethuba lokuzolula,” utshilo uKomani. 
Umfo kaKomani uphumelele imilo elishumi elinesixhenxe, ubethwe kwesixhenxe emva kwemilo engamashumi amabini anesine. Ngoku uthi ufuna uNxhosho amnike ithuba lokulwela itayitile yoMzantsi Afrika.

headline: ULakay uyinkankathe ngenduku iGolden Arrows ngokuhlwa kwanamhlanje
text:
Iphulukene nomdlalo wayo wesibini iGolden Arrows emva kokucanjalaliswa kabuhlungu ngamagowuli amane kwelinye (4-1) yiCape Town City ekelemileyo emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership ngokuhlwa kwanamhlanje e-Emirates Airline Park. UFagrie Lakay wenze idemesha engasoze ilityalwe ngokubhakuzelisa umnatha kathathu eyedwa emdlalweni wanamhlanje eqinisekisa okokuba iCape Town City iqhubela phambili nomsebenzi omhle ukusukela oko kuthe kwabuyelwa emabaleni ngamaqela abekhe ahlala phantsi ixesha elide ngenxa yekhorona eswantsulisa ihlabathi. Umdlalo ubumhle, omabini amaqela ebedlala umdlalo omhle okhawulezayo. Kuyiwe ekhefini iCape Town City ihamba phambili ngamagowuli amabini afakwe yifolosi eyingozi, uLakay. 
Omabini amaqela akhuphe abadlali bawo abaphambili ngenxa yokonzakala. UKermit Erasmus uphumile, endaweni yakhe kwafakwa uTashreeq Morris endaweni yakhe yiCape Town City. Yona iGolden Arrows ikhuphe uSiboniso Conco, yafaka uSiyabonga Dube. UMorris ufake igowuli leCity – kodwa amakhwenke kaSteve Komphela alifumene igowuli lokubika elifakwe nguKnox Mutizwa emshiye uLeeuwenburgh engazi nokuba makathini ezipalini. Ukuphumelela kweCity kuthetha ukuthi iza kuhlala kwindawo yesixhenxe – kanti yona iGolden Arrows iye kwindawo yeshumi elinanye. Emini namhlanje, i-Orlando Pirates ibethe iSuperSport United ngo’2-1, iHighlands Park ibambene neMaritzburg United, wona AmaZulu abetha iLeopards ngo’1-0.
